GE09ram_03pu:ram_1.3b: pūjitaṃ copanṛttaṃ ca nityam apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_1.5a: āraṇyaiś ca mahāvṛkṣaiḥ puṇyaiḥ svāduphalair vṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_1.6a: puṣpair vanyaiḥ parikṣiptaṃ padminyā ca sapadmayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_1.9b: abhyagacchan mahātejā vijyaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_1.10b: abhyagacchaṃs tadā prītā vaidehīṃ ca yaśasvinīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_1.11a: te taṃ somam ivodyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai dharmacāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_1.13a: vaidehīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaṃ netrair animiṣair iva /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_1.16a: mūlaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vanyam āśramaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_1.17b: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca rājā daṇḍadharo guruḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_1.18b: rājā tasmād varān bhogān bhuṅkte lokanamaskṛtaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_1.19b: nagarastho vanastho vā tvaṃ no rājā janeśvaraḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_1.21a: evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpair vanyaiś ca rāghavam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.1b: āmantrya sa munīn sarvān vanam evānvagāhata // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.7a: trīn siṃhāṃś caturo vyāghrān dvau vṛkau pṛṣatān daśa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.7b: saviṣāṇaṃ vasādigdhaṃ gajasya ca śiro mahat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.8b: sa rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maithilīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.9b: sa kṛtvā bhairavaṃ nādaṃ cālayann iva medinīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.11b: kathaṃ tāpasayor vāṃ ca vāsaḥ pramadayā saha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.12b: ahaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ virādho nāma rākṣasaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.13a: iyaṃ nārī varārohā mama bhāryā bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.13b: yuvayoḥ pāpayoś cāhaṃ pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ mṛdhe // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.15a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ sītāṃ virādhāṅkagatāṃ śubhām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.17a: yad abhipretam asmāsu priyaṃ varavṛtaṃ ca yat /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.17b: kaikeyyās tu susaṃvṛttaṃ kṣipram adyaiva lakṣmaṇa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.17c: yā na tuṣyati rājyena putrārthe dīrghadarśinī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.18b: adyedānīṃ sakāmā sā yā mātā mama madhyamā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.19a: parasparśāt tu vaidehyā na duḥkhataram asti me /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.20b: abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho ruddho nāga iva śvasan // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.21a: anātha iva bhūtānāṃ nāthas tvaṃ vāsavopamaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.22b: virādhasya gatāsor hi mahī pāsyati śoṇitam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.23a: rājyakāme mama krodho bharate yo babhūva ha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.23b: taṃ virādhe vimokṣyāmi vajrī vajram ivācale // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.23c: mama bhujabalavegavegitaḥ patatu śaro 'sya mahān mahorasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_2.23d: vyapanayatu tanoś ca jīvitaṃ patatu tataś ca mahīṃ vighūrṇitaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.1a: athovāca punar vākyaṃ virādhaḥ pūrayan vanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.1b: ātmānaṃ pṛcchate brūtaṃ kau yuvāṃ kva gamiṣyathaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.2a: tam uvāca tato rāmo rākṣasaṃ jvalitānanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.3b: tvāṃ tu veditum icchāvaḥ kas tvaṃ carasi daṇḍakān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.4a: tam uvāca virādhas tu rāmaṃ satyaparākramam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.4b: hanta vakṣyāmi te rājan nibodha mama rāghava // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.5a: putraḥ kila jayasyāhaṃ mātā mama śatahradā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.5b: virādha iti mām āhuḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvarākṣasāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.6a: tapasā cāpi me prāptā brahmaṇo hi prasādajā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.7b: tvaramāṇau pālayethāṃ na vāṃ jīvitam ādade // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.9a: kṣudra dhik tvāṃ tu hīnārthaṃ mṛtyum anveṣase dhruvam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.9b: raṇe samprāpsyase tiṣṭha na me jīvan gamiṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.10a: tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā rāmaḥ suniśitāñ śarān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.14b: dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ cicheda rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.15a: tasya raudrasya saumitrir bāhuṃ savyaṃ babhañja ha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.15b: rāmas tu dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ tarasā tasya rakṣasaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.17a: kausalyā suprajās tāta rāmas tvaṃ vidito mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.17b: vaidehī ca mahābhāgā lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.18a: abhiśāpād ahaṃ ghorāṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasīṃ tanum /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.18b: tumburur nāma gandharvaḥ śapto vaiśravaṇena hi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.19a: prasādyamānaś ca mayā so 'bravīn māṃ mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.19b: yadā dāśarathī rāmas tvāṃ vadhiṣyati saṃyuge // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.20a: tadā prakṛtim āpanno bhavān svargaṃ gamiṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.20b: iti vaiśravaṇo rājā rambhāsaktam uvāca ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.21b: bhavanaṃ svaṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu paraṃtapa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.23a: taṃ kṣipram abhigaccha tvaṃ sa te śreyo vidhāsyati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.23b: avaṭe cāpi māṃ rāma nikṣipya kuśalī vraja // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.24b: avaṭe ye nidhīyante teṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.25a: evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ śarapīḍitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.26c: tatas tu tau kāñcanacitrakārmukau nihatya rakṣaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.26d: vijahratus tau muditau mahāvane divi sthitau candradivākarāv iva //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_3.26e: hatvā tu taṃ bhīmabalaṃ virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ vane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.1a: tataḥ sītāṃ pariṣvajya samāśvāsya ca vīryavān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.2a: kaṣṭaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ na ca smo vanagocarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.10c: dṛṣṭvā śatakratuṃ tatra rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.11a: ye hayāḥ puruhūtasya purā śakrasya naḥ śrutāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.11b: antarikṣagatā divyās ta ime harayo dhruvam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.12a: ime ca puruṣavyāghra ye tiṣṭhanty abhito ratham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.14a: etaddhi kila devānāṃ vayo bhavati nityadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.15a: ihaiva saha vaidehyā muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.15b: yāvaj janāmy ahaṃ vyaktaṃ ka eṣa dyutimān rathe // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.16a: tam evam uktvā saumitrim ihaiva sthīyatām iti /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.18a: ihopayāty asau rāmo yāvan māṃ nābhibhāṣate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.18b: niṣṭhāṃ nayata tāvat tu tato māṃ draṣṭum arhati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.19a: jitavantaṃ kṛtārthaṃ ca draṣṭāham acirād imam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.19b: karma hy anena kartavyaṃ mahad anyaiḥ suduṣkaram // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.20a: iti vajrī tam āmantrya mānayitvā ca tāpasam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.22a: tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya rāmaḥ sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.23a: tataḥ śakropayānaṃ tu paryapṛcchat sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.23b: śarabhaṅgaś ca tat sarvaṃ rāghavāya nyavedayat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.24a: mām eṣa varado rāma brahmalokaṃ ninīṣati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.25b: brahmalokaṃ na gacchāmi tvām adṛṣṭvā priyātithim // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.26a: akṣayā naraśārdūla jitā lokā mayā śubhāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.26b: brāhmyāś ca nākapṛṣṭhyāś ca pratigṛhṇīṣva māmakān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.28b: āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.30a: sutīkṣṇam abhigaccha tvaṃ śucau deśe tapasvinam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.30b: ramaṇīye vanoddeśe sa te vāsaṃ vidhāsyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.31a: eṣa panthā naravyāghra muhūrtaṃ paśya tāta mām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.31b: yāvaj jahāmi gātrāṇi jīrṇāṃ tvacam ivoragaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.32a: tato 'gniṃ sa samādhāya hutvā cājyena mantravit /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.33a: tasya romāṇi keśāṃś ca dadāhāgnir mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.33b: jīrṇāṃ tvacaṃ tathāsthīni yac ca māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.35a: sa lokān āhitāgnīnām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.35c: sa puṇyakarmā bhuvane dvijarṣabhaḥ pitāmahaṃ sānucaraṃ dadarśa ha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_4.35d: pitāmahaś cāpi samīkṣya taṃ dvijaṃ nananda susvāgatam ity uvāca ha //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.2b: aśmakuṭṭāś ca bahavaḥ pattrāhārāś ca tāpasāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.6a: abhigamya ca dharmajñā rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.7b: pradhānaś cāsi nāthaś ca devānāṃ maghavān iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.8a: viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu yaśasā vikrameṇa ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.8b: pitṛvratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca tvayi dharmaś ca puṣkalaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.9b: arthitvān nātha vakṣyāmas tac ca naḥ kṣantum arhasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.10a: adharmas tu mahāṃs tāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.10b: yo hared baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ na ca rakṣati putravat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.11a: yuñjānaḥ svān iva prāṇān prāṇair iṣṭān sutān iva /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.12a: prāpnoti śāśvatīṃ rāma kīrtiṃ sa bahuvārṣikīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.12b: brahmaṇaḥ sthānam āsādya tatra cāpi mahīyate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.13a: yat karoti paraṃ dharmaṃ munir mūlaphalāśanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.13b: tatra rājñaś caturbhāgaḥ prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.14b: tvan nātho 'nāthavad rāma rākṣasair vadhyate bhṛśam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.15b: hatānāṃ rākṣasair ghorair bahūnāṃ bahudhā vane // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.17a: evaṃ vayaṃ na mṛṣyāmo viprakāraṃ tapasvinām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.18a: tatas tvāṃ śaraṇārthaṃ ca śaraṇyaṃ samupasthitāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.18c: etac chrutvā tu kākutsthas tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.19a: idaṃ provāca dharmātmā sarvān eva tapasvinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.19b: naivam arhatha māṃ vaktum ājñāpyo 'haṃ tapasvinām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.20a: tasya me 'yaṃ vane vāso bhaviṣyati mahāphalaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.20b: tapasvināṃ raṇe śatrūn hantum icchāmi rākṣasān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.21a: dattvā varaṃ cāpi tapodhanānāṃ dharme dhṛtātmā saha lakṣmaṇena /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_5.21b: tapodhanaiś cāpi sabhājyavṛttaḥ sutīkṣṇam evābhijagāma vīraḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.1a: rāmas tu sahito bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.2a: sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ nadīs tīrtvā bahūdakāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.3a: tatas tad ikṣvākuvarau satataṃ vividhair drumaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.3b: kānanaṃ tau viviśatuḥ sītayā saha rāghavau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.6a: rāmo 'ham asmi bhagavan bhavantaṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.7a: sa nirīkṣya tato vīraṃ rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.7b: samāśliṣya ca bāhubhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.8a: svāgataṃ khalu te vīra rāma dharmabhṛtāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.9b: devalokam ito vīra dehaṃ tyaktvā mahītale // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.10b: sarvāṃl lokāñ jitān āha mama puṇyena karmaṇā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.13b: āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.15a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.16a: ayam evāśramo rāma guṇavān ramyatām iha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.18a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya maharṣer lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.18b: uvāca vacanaṃ dhīro vikṛṣya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.20a: bhavāṃs tatrābhiṣajyeta kiṃ syāt kṛcchrataraṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.20b: etasminn āśrame vāsaṃ ciraṃ tu na samarthaye // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.21a: tam evam uktvā varadaṃ rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāgamat /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.21b: anvāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tatra vāsam akalpayat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.21c: tataḥ śubhaṃ tāpasabhojyam annaṃ svayaṃ sutīkṣṇaḥ puruṣarṣabhābhyām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_6.21d: tābhyāṃ susatkṛtya dadau mahātmā saṃdhyānivṛttau rajanīṃ samīkṣya //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_7.2a: utthāya tu yathākālaṃ rāghavaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_7.3a: atha te 'gniṃ surāṃś caiva vaidehī rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_7.5a: sukhoṣitāḥ sma bhagavaṃs tvayā pūjyena pūjitāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_7.9a: tāvad icchāmahe gantum ity uktvā caraṇau muneḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_7.10b: gāḍham āliṅgya sasneham idaṃ vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_7.11a: ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ rāma saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_7.16a: gamyatāṃ vatsa saumitre bhavān api ca gacchatu /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_7.16b: āgantavyaṃ ca te dṛṣṭvā punar evāśramaṃ mama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_7.17a: evam uktas tathety uktvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_7.18b: dadau sītā tayor bhrātroḥ khaḍgau ca vimalau tataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_7.19a: ābadhya ca śubhe tūṇī cāpau cādāya sasvanau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_7.19b: niṣkrāntāv āśramād gantum ubhau tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.1b: vaidehī snigdhayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.2a: ayaṃ dharmaḥ susūkṣmeṇa vidhinā prāpyate mahān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.2b: nivṛttena ca śakyo 'yaṃ vyasanāt kāmajād iha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.2c: trīṇy eva vyasanāny atra kāmajāni bhavanty uta /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.4a: mithyāvākyaṃ na te bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.5a: tac ca sarvaṃ mahābāho śakyaṃ voḍhuṃ jitendriyaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.6b: nirvairaṃ kriyate mohāt tac ca te samupasthitam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.8a: etannimittaṃ ca vanaṃ daṇḍakā iti viśrutam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.9a: tatas tvāṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama cintākulaṃ manaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.9b: tvadvṛttaṃ cintayantyā vai bhaven niḥśreyasaṃ hitam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.10a: na hi me rocate vīra gamanaṃ daṇḍakān prati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.10b: kāraṇaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi vadantyāḥ śrūyatāṃ mama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.11a: tvaṃ hi bāṇadhanuṣpāṇir bhrātrā saha vanaṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.11b: dṛṣṭvā vanacarān sarvān kaccit kuryāḥ śaravyayam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.12b: samīpataḥ sthitaṃ tejo- balam ucchrayate bhṛśam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.13a: purā kila mahābāho tapasvī satyavāk śuciḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.14a: tasyaiva tapaso vighnaṃ kartum indraḥ śacīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.15b: sa nyāsavidhinā dattaḥ puṇye tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.16b: vane tu vicaraty eva rakṣan pratyayam ātmanaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.17a: yatra gacchaty upādātuṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.17b: na vinā yāti taṃ khaḍgaṃ nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.18a: nityaṃ śastraṃ parivahan krameṇa sa tapodhanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.18b: cakāra raudrīṃ svāṃ buddhiṃ tyaktvā tapasi niścayam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.19b: tasya śastrasya saṃvāsāj jagāma narakaṃ muniḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.20a: snehāc ca bahumānāc ca smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.20b: na kathaṃcana sā kāryā gṛhītadhanuṣā tvayā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.21a: buddhir vairaṃ vinā hantuṃ rākṣasān daṇḍakāśritān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.21b: aparādhaṃ vinā hantuṃ lokān vīra na kāmaye // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.23a: kva ca śastraṃ kva ca vanaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ tapaḥ kva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.23b: vyāviddham idam asmābhir deśadharmas tu pūjyatām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.24b: punar gatvā tv ayodhyāyāṃ kṣatradharmaṃ cariṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.25a: akṣayā tu bhavet prītiḥ śvaśrūśvaśurayor mama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.25b: yadi rājyaṃ hi saṃnyasya bhaves tvaṃ nirato muniḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.26a: dharmād arthaḥ prabhavati dharmāt prabhavate sukham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.26b: dharmeṇa labhate sarvaṃ dharmasāram idaṃ jagat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.27a: ātmānaṃ niyamais tais taiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.27b: prāpyate nipuṇair dharmo na sukhāl labhyate sukham // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.28a: nityaṃ śucimatiḥ saumya cara dharmaṃ tapovane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.28b: sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tubhyaṃ trailokyam api tattvataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.29a: strīcāpalād etad udāhṛtaṃ me dharmaṃ ca vaktuṃ tava kaḥ samarthaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_8.29b: vicārya buddhyā tu sahānujena yad rocate tat kuru mācireṇa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.1a: vākyam etat tu vaidehyā vyāhṛtaṃ bhartṛbhaktayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.1b: śrutvā dharme sthito rāmaḥ pratyuvācātha maithilīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.2a: hitam uktaṃ tvayā devi snigdhayā sadṛśaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.3a: kiṃ tu vakṣyāmy ahaṃ devi tvayaivoktam idaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.3b: kṣatriyair dhāryate cāpo nārtaśabdo bhaved iti // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.4b: māṃ sīte svayam āgamya śaraṇyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.5b: na labhante sukhaṃ bhītā rākṣasaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.6a: kāle kāle ca niratā niyamair vividhair vane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.8a: mayā tu vacanaṃ śrutvā teṣām evaṃ mukhāc cyutam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.8c: prasīdantu bhavanto me hrīr eṣā hi mamātulā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.9b: kiṃ karomīti ca mayā vyāhṛtaṃ dvijasaṃnidhau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.9c: sarvair eva samāgamya vāg iyaṃ samudāhṛtā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.10b: arditāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ rāma bhavān nas trātum arhati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.12b: gatiṃ mṛgayamāṇānāṃ bhavān naḥ paramā gatiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.13b: cirārjitaṃ tu necchāmas tapaḥ khaṇḍayituṃ vayam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.14b: tena śāpaṃ na muñcāmo bhakṣyamāṇāś ca rākṣasaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.15b: rakṣa nas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā tvannāthā hi vayaṃ vane // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.16a: mayā caitad vacaḥ śrutvā kārtsnyena paripālanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.17a: saṃśrutya ca na śakṣyāmi jīvamānaḥ pratiśravam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.17b: munīnām anyathā kartuṃ satyam iṣṭaṃ hi me sadā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.18a: apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ tvāṃ vā sīte salakṣmaṇām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.18b: na tu pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya brāhmaṇebhyo viśeṣataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.19a: tad avaśyaṃ mayā kāryam ṛṣīṇāṃ paripālanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.19b: anuktenāpi vaidehi pratijñāya tu kiṃ punaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.19c: mama snehāc ca sauhārdād idam uktaṃ tvayā vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.20a: parituṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ sīte na hy aniṣṭo 'nuśiṣyate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.20b: sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kulasya tava śobhane // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.21a: ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā sītāṃ priyāṃ maithilarājaputrīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_9.21b: rāmo dhanuṣmān saha lakṣmaṇena jagāma ramyāṇi tapovanāni // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.1a: agrataḥ prayayau rāmaḥ sītā madhye sumadhyamā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.2a: tau paśyamānau vividhāñ śailaprasthān vanāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.2b: nadīś ca vividhā ramyā jagmatuḥ saha sītayā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.3b: sarāṃsi ca sapadmāni yutāni jalajaiḥ khagaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.4b: mahiṣāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca gajāṃś ca drumavairiṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.5a: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.8a: tataḥ kautūhalād rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.9a: idam atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ no mahāmune /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.9b: kautūhalaṃ mahaj jātaṃ kim idaṃ sādhu kathyatām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.10a: tenaivam ukto dharmātmā rāghaveṇa munis tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.12a: sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ māṇḍakarṇir mahāmuniḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.13b: asmākaṃ kasyacit sthānam eṣa prārthayate muniḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.14a: tataḥ kartuṃ tapovighnaṃ sarvair devair niyojitāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.16a: tāś caivāpsarasaḥ pañca muneḥ patnītvam āgatāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.16b: taṭāke nirmitaṃ tāsām asminn antarhitaṃ gṛham // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.21a: praviśya saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.21b: tadā tasmin sa kākutsthaḥ śrīmaty āśramamaṇḍale // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.23a: yeṣām uṣitavān pūrvaṃ sakāśe sa mahāstravit /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.23b: kvacit paridaśān māsān ekaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kvacit // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.24a: kvacic ca caturo māsān pañcaṣaṭ cāparān kvacit /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.24c: trīn māsān aṣṭamāsāṃś ca rāghavo nyavasat sukham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.25a: tathā saṃvasatas tasya munīnām āśrameṣu vai /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.26a: parisṛtya ca dharmajño rāghavaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.27a: sa tam āśramam āgamya munibhiḥ pratipūjitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.27b: tatrāpi nyavasad rāmaḥ kaṃcit kālam ariṃdamaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.28b: upāsīnaḥ sa kākutsthaḥ sutīkṣṇam idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.29b: vasatīti mayā nityaṃ kathāḥ kathayatāṃ śrutam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.30a: na tu jānāmi taṃ deśaṃ vanasyāsya mahattayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.31a: prasādāt tatra bhavataḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.32b: yad ahaṃ taṃ munivaraṃ śuśrūṣeyam api svayam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.33a: iti rāmasya sa muniḥ śrutvā dharmātmano vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.34a: aham apy etad eva tvāṃ vaktukāmaḥ salakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.35a: diṣṭyā tv idānīm arthe 'smin svayam eva bravīṣi mām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.35b: aham ākhyāsi te vatsa yatrāgastyo mahāmuniḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.36a: yojanāny āśramāt tāta yāhi catvāri vai tataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.39a: tatraikāṃ rajanīm uṣya prabhāte rāma gamyatām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.40b: raṃsyate tatra vaidehī lakṣmaṇaś ca tvayā saha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.41a: yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā draṣṭum agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.42a: iti rāmo muneḥ śrutvā saha bhrātrābhivādya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.46a: yathā hīme vanasyāsya jñātāḥ pathi sahasraśaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.47a: pippalīnāṃ ca pakvānāṃ vanād asmād upāgataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.48a: tatra tatra ca dṛśyante saṃkṣiptāḥ kāṣṭhasaṃcayāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.48b: lūnāś ca pathi dṛśyante darbhā vaiḍūryavarcasaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.51a: tat sutīkṣṇasya vacanaṃ yathā saumya mayā śrutam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.52b: yasya bhrātrā kṛteyaṃ dik śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.53a: ihaikadā kila krūro vātāpir api celvalaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.54a: dhārayan brāhmaṇaṃ rūpam ilvalaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vadan /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.54b: āmantrayati viprān sa śrāddham uddiśya nirghṛṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.55a: bhrātaraṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhrātā tatas taṃ meṣarūpiṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.57a: tato bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā vātāpir meṣavan nadan /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.59b: anubhūya kila śrāddhe bhakṣitaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.60a: tataḥ sampannam ity uktvā dattvā hastāvasecanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.61a: taṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ tu bhrātaraṃ vipraghātinam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.62a: kuto niṣkramituṃ śaktir mayā jīrṇasya rakṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.63a: atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur nidhanasaṃśritam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.67a: upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ saha bhrātrā yathāvidhi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.68a: samyak pratigṛhītas tu muninā tena rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.68b: nyavasat tāṃ niśām ekāṃ prāśya mūlaphalāni ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.70a: abhivādaye tvā bhagavan sukham adhyuṣito niśām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.70b: āmantraye tvāṃ gacchāmi guruṃ te draṣṭum agrajam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.72a: nīvārān panasāṃs tālāṃs timiśān vañjulān dhavān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.72b: ciribilvān madhūkāṃś ca bilvān api ca tindukān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.76a: snigdhapattrā yathā vṛkṣā yathā kṣāntā mṛgadvijāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.77a: agastya iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.79b: dakṣiṇā dik kṛtā yena śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.80b: dig iyaṃ dakṣiṇā trāsād dṛśyate nopabhujyate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.82a: nāmnā ceyaṃ bhagavato dakṣiṇā dik pradakṣiṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.83b: saṃdeśaṃ pālayaṃs tasya vindhyaḥ śailo na vardhate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.85a: eṣa lokārcitaḥ sādhur hite nityaṃ rataḥ satām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.86b: śeṣaṃ ca vanavāsasya saumya vatsyāmy ahaṃ prabho // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.87a: atra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.88a: nātra jīven mṛṣāvādī krūro vā yadi vā śaṭhaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.88b: nṛśaṃsaḥ kāmavṛtto vā munir eṣa tathāvidhaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.89a: atra devāś ca yakṣāś ca nāgāś ca patagaiḥ saha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.90b: tyaktvā dehān navair dehaiḥ svaryātāḥ paramarṣayaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.91a: yakṣatvam amaratvaṃ ca rājyāni vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.91b: atra devāḥ prayacchanti bhūtair ārādhitāḥ śubhaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_10.92b: nivedayeha māṃ prāptam ṛṣaye saha sītayā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.1b: agastyaśiṣyam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.2a: rājā daśaratho nāma jyeṣṭhas tasya suto balī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.2b: rāmaḥ prāpto muniṃ draṣṭuṃ bhāryayā saha sītayā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.3a: lakṣmaṇo nāma tasyāhaṃ bhrātā tv avarajo hitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.3b: anukūlaś ca bhaktaś ca yadi te śrotram āgataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.4a: te vayaṃ vanam atyugraṃ praviṣṭāḥ pitṛśāsanāt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.7a: putrau daśarathasyemau rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.9a: tataḥ śiṣyād upaśrutya prāptaṃ rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.9b: vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.10a: diṣṭyā rāmaś cirasyādya draṣṭuṃ māṃ samupāgataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.10b: manasā kāṅkṣitaṃ hy asya mayāpy āgamanaṃ prati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.11b: praveśyatāṃ samīpaṃ me kiṃ cāsau na praveśitaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.12a: evam uktas tu muninā dharmajñena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.13a: tato niṣkramya saṃbhrāntaḥ śiṣyo lakṣmaṇam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.13b: kvāsau rāmo muniṃ draṣṭum etu praviśatu svayam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.15a: taṃ śiṣyaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam agastyavacanaṃ bruvan /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.17a: sa tatra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam agneḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.17b: viṣṇoḥ sthānaṃ mahendrasya sthānaṃ caiva vivasvataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.18a: somasthānaṃ bhagasthānaṃ sthānaṃ kauberam eva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.18b: dhātur vidhātuḥ sthānaṃ ca vāyoḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.18c: tataḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto munir apy abhiniṣpatat /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.20a: eṣa lakṣmaṇa niṣkrāmaty agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.22a: abhivādya tu dharmātmā tasthau rāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.22b: sītayā saha vaidehyā tadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.23b: kuśalapraśnam uktvā ca āsyatām iti so 'bravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.24a: agniṃ hutvā pradāyārghyam atithiṃ pratipūjya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.24b: vānaprasthena dharmeṇa sa teṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.26b: duḥsākṣīva pare loke svāni māṃsāni bhakṣayet // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.27b: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca bhavān prāptaḥ priyātithiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.28a: evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpaiś cānyaiś ca rāghavam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.31a: sampūrṇau niśitair bāṇair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.32a: anena dhanuṣā rāma hatvā saṃkhye mahāsurān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.32b: ājahāra śriyaṃ dīptāṃ purā viṣṇur divaukasām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.33a: tad dhanus tau ca tūṇīrau śaraṃ khaḍgaṃ ca mānada /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.34a: evam uktvā mahātejāḥ samastaṃ tad varāyudham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_11.34b: dattvā rāmāya bhagavān agastyaḥ punar abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.1a: rāma prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te parituṣṭo 'smi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.1b: abhivādayituṃ yan māṃ prāptau sthaḥ saha sītayā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.3a: eṣā hi sukumārī ca duḥkhaiś ca na vimānitā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.4a: yathaiṣā ramate rāma iha sītā tathā kuru /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.4b: duṣkaraṃ kṛtavaty eṣā vane tvām anugacchatī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.5a: eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.7a: iyaṃ tu bhavato bhāryā doṣair etair vivarjitā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.7b: ślāghyā ca vyapadeśyā ca yathā devī hy arundhatī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.8a: alaṃkṛto 'yaṃ deśaś ca yatra saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.8b: vaidehyā cānayā rāma vatsyasi tvam ariṃdama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.9a: evam uktas tu muninā rāghavaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.9b: uvāca praśritaṃ vākyam ṛṣiṃ dīptam ivānalam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.11a: kiṃ tu vyādiśa me deśaṃ sodakaṃ bahukānanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.12b: dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ dharmātmā dhīro dhīrataraṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.14b: ramasva tvaṃ pitur vākyaṃ yathoktam anupālayan // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.15a: vidito hy eṣa vṛttānto mama sarvas tavānagha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.15b: tapasaś ca prabhāvena snehād daśarathasya ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.16a: hṛdayasthaś ca te chando vijñātas tapasā mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.16b: iha vāsaṃ pratijñāya mayā saha tapovane // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.17a: ataś ca tvām ahaṃ brūmi gaccha pañcavaṭīm iti /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.17b: sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo maithilī tatra raṃsyate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.18a: sa deśaḥ ślāghanīyaś ca nātidūre ca rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.18b: godāvaryāḥ samīpe ca maithilī tatra raṃsyate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.19b: viviktaś ca mahābāho puṇyo ramyas tathaiva ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.20a: bhavān api sadāraś ca śaktaś ca parirakṣaṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.20b: api cātra vasan rāmas tāpasān pālayiṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.21a: etad ālakṣyate vīra madhūkānāṃ mahad vanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.23a: agastyenaivam uktas tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.24c: gṛhītacāpau tu narādhipātmajau viṣaktatūṇī samareṣv akātarau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_12.24d: yathopadiṣṭena pathā maharṣiṇā prajagmatuḥ pañcavaṭīṃ samāhitau //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.2a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau mahābhāgau vanasthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.2b: menāte rākṣasaṃ pakṣiṃ bruvāṇau ko bhavān iti // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.3a: sa tau madhurayā vācā saumyayā prīṇayann iva /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.3b: uvāca vatsa māṃ viddhi vayasyaṃ pitur ātmanaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.4a: sa taṃ pitṛsakhaṃ buddhvā pūjayāmāsa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.4b: sa tasya kulam avyagram atha papraccha nāma ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.5a: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kulam ātmānam eva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.6b: tān me nigadataḥ sarvān āditaḥ śṛṇu rāghava // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.7b: śeṣaś ca saṃśrayaś caiva bahuputraś ca vīryavān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.8a: sthāṇur marīcir atriś ca kratuś caiva mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.8b: pulastyaś cāṅgirāś caiva pracetāḥ pulahas tathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.9b: kaśyapaś ca mahātejās teṣām āsīc ca paścimaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.10a: prajāpates tu dakṣasya babhūvur iti naḥ śrutam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.11b: aditiṃ ca ditiṃ caiva danum api ca kālakām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.12a: tāmrāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva manuṃ cāpy analām api /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.12b: tās tu kanyās tataḥ prītaḥ kaśyapaḥ punar abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.13b: aditis tanmanā rāma ditiś ca danur eva ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.14a: kālakā ca mahābāho śeṣās tv amanaso 'bhavan /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.15a: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca paraṃtapa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.15b: ditis tv ajanayat putrān daityāṃs tāta yaśasvinaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.16b: danus tv ajanayat putram aśvagrīvam ariṃdama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.17b: krauñcīṃ bhāsīṃ tathā śyenīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrīṃ tathā śukīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.18b: ulūkāñ janayat krauñcī bhāsī bhāsān vyajāyata // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.19a: śyenī śyenāṃś ca gṛdhrāṃś ca vyajāyata sutejasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.19b: dhṛtarāṣṭrī tu haṃsāṃś ca kalahaṃsāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.20a: cakravākāṃś ca bhadraṃ te vijajñe sāpi bhāminī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.20b: śukī natāṃ vijajñe tu natāyā vinatā sutā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.21b: mṛgīṃ ca mṛgamandāṃ ca harīṃ bhadramadām api // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.22a: mātaṃgīm atha śārdūlīṃ śvetāṃ ca surabhīṃ tathā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.23a: apatyaṃ tu mṛgāḥ sarve mṛgyā naravarottama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.23b: ṛkṣāś ca mṛgamandāyāḥ sṛmarāś camarās tathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.24a: tatas tv irāvatīṃ nāma jajñe bhadramadā sutām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.24b: tasyās tv airāvataḥ putro lokanātho mahāgajaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.25a: haryāś ca harayo 'patyaṃ vānarāś ca tapasvinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.25b: golāṅgūlāṃś ca śārdūlī vyāghrāṃś cājanayat sutān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.26a: mātaṃgyās tv atha mātaṃgā apatyaṃ manujarṣabha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.26b: diśāgajaṃ tu śvetākṣaṃ śvetā vyajanayat sutam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.27a: tato duhitarau rāma surabhir devy ajāyata /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.27b: rohiṇīṃ nāma bhadraṃ te gandharvīṃ ca yaśasvinīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.28a: rohiṇy ajanayad gā vai gandharvī vājinaḥ sutān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.28b: surasājanayan nāgān rāma kadrūś ca pannagān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.29b: brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś ca manujarṣabha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.30a: mukhato brāhmaṇā jātā urasaḥ kṣatriyās tathā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.30b: ūrubhyāṃ jajñire vaiśyāḥ padbhyāṃ śūdrā iti śrutiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.31b: vinatā ca śukī pautrī kadrūś ca surasā svasā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.32a: kadrūr nāgaṃ sahasraṃ tu vijajñe dharaṇīdharam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.32b: dvau putrau vinatāyās tu garuḍo 'ruṇa eva ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.33a: tasmāj jāto 'ham aruṇāt sampātiś ca mamāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.33b: jaṭāyur iti māṃ viddhi śyenīputram ariṃdama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.34b: sītāṃ ca tāta rakṣiṣye tvayi yāte salakṣmaṇe // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.34c: jaṭāyuṣaṃ tu pratipūjya rāghavo mudā pariṣvajya ca saṃnato 'bhavat /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.34d: pitur hi śuśrāva sakhitvam ātmavāñ jaṭāyuṣā saṃkathitaṃ punaḥ punaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.34e: sa tatra sītāṃ paridāya maithilīṃ sahaiva tenātibalena pakṣiṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_13.34f: jagāma tāṃ pañcavaṭīṃ salakṣmaṇo ripūn didhakṣañ śalabhān ivānalaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.2a: āgatāḥ sma yathoddiṣṭam amuṃ deśaṃ maharṣiṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.3a: sarvataś cāryatāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kānane nipuṇo hy asi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.3b: āśramaḥ katarasmin no deśe bhavati saṃmataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.4a: ramate yatra vaidehī tvam ahaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.6a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.7a: paravān asmi kākutstha tvayi varṣaśataṃ sthite /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.7b: svayaṃ tu rucire deśe kriyatām iti māṃ vada // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.9a: sa taṃ ruciram ākramya deśam āśramakarmaṇi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.9b: hastau gṛhītvā hastena rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.10a: ayaṃ deśaḥ samaḥ śrīmān puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.12b: iyaṃ godāvarī ramyā puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.14b: dṛśyante girayaḥ saumya phullais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.15a: sauvarṇe rājatais tāmrair deśe deśe ca dhātubhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.16a: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca kharjūraiḥ panasāmrakaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.17a: cūtair aśokais tilakaiś campakaiḥ ketakair api /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.18a: candanaiḥ syandanair nīpaiḥ panasair lakucair api /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.19a: idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ bahumṛgadvijam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.19b: iha vatsyāma saumitre sārdham etena pakṣiṇā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.20a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.22a: sa gatvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nadīṃ godāvarīṃ tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.22b: snātvā padmāni cādāya saphalaḥ punar āgataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.23a: tataḥ puṣpabaliṃ kṛtvā śāntiṃ ca sa yathāvidhi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.24a: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ saumyam āśramaṃ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.25b: atisnigdhaṃ ca gāḍhaṃ ca vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.26a: prīto 'smi te mahat karma tvayā kṛtam idaṃ prabho /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.26b: pradeyo yannimittaṃ te pariṣvaṅgo mayā kṛtaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.27b: tvayā putreṇa dharmātmā na saṃvṛttaḥ pitā mama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.28a: evaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktvā tu rāghavo lakṣmivardhanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.28b: tasmin deśe bahuphale nyavasat sa sukhaṃ vaśī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_14.29a: kaṃcit kālaṃ sa dharmātmā sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.1a: asatas tasya tu sukhaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.3a: prahvaḥ kalaśahastas taṃ sītayā saha vīryavān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.4a: ayaṃ sa kālaḥ samprāptaḥ priyo yas te priyaṃvada /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.14b: sīteva cātapaśyāmā lakṣyate na tu śobhate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.18b: dūram abhyuditaḥ sūryaḥ śaśāṅka iva lakṣyate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.19b: saṃraktaḥ kiṃcid āpāṇḍur ātapaḥ śobhate kṣitau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.23b: śaityād agāgrastham api prāyeṇa rasavaj jalam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.25b: tapaś carati dharmātmā tvadbhaktyā bharataḥ pure // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.26a: tyaktvā rājyaṃ ca mānaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca vividhān bahūn /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.27a: so 'pi velām imāṃ nūnam abhiṣekārtham udyataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.27b: vṛtaḥ prakṛtibhir nityaṃ prayāti sarayūṃ nadīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.31a: jitaḥ svargas tava bhrātrā bharatena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.31b: vanastham api tāpasye yas tvām anuvidhīyate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.32a: na pitryam anuvartante mātṛkaṃ dvipadā iti /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.33a: bhartā daśaratho yasyāḥ sādhuś ca bharataḥ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.33b: kathaṃ nu sāmbā kaikeyī tādṛśī krūradarśinī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.34a: ity evaṃ lakṣmaṇe vākyaṃ snehād bruvati dhārmike /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.35a: na te 'mbā madhyamā tāta garhitavyā kathaṃcana /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.36a: niścitāpi hi me buddhir vanavāse dṛḍhavratā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.37a: ity evaṃ vilapaṃs tatra prāpya godāvarīṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.38a: tarpayitvātha salilais te pitṝn daivatāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.38b: stuvanti smoditaṃ sūryaṃ devatāś ca samāhitāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.38c: kṛtābhiṣekaḥ sa rarāja rāmaḥ sītādvitīyaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_15.38d: kṛtābhiṣekas tv agarājaputryā rudraḥ sanandī bhagavān iveśaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.1a: kṛtābhiṣeko rāmas tu sītā saumitrir eva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.1b: tasmād godāvarītīrāt tato jagmuḥ svam āśramam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.2c: sa rāmaḥ parṇaśālāyām āsīnaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.3b: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cakāra vividhāḥ kathāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.4b: taṃ deśaṃ rākṣasī kācid ājagāma yadṛcchayā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.5a: sā tu śūrpaṇakhā nāma daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.11b: āgatas tvam imaṃ deśaṃ kathaṃ rākṣasasevitam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.12a: evam uktas tu rākṣasyā śūrpaṇakhyā paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.13b: tasyāham agrajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.14a: bhrātāyaṃ lakṣmaṇo nāma yavīyān mām anuvrataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.14b: iyaṃ bhāryā ca vaidehī mama sīteti viśrutā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.15a: niyogāt tu narendrasya pitur mātuś ca yantritaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.15b: dharmārthaṃ dharmakāṅkṣī ca vanaṃ vastum ihāgataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.16a: tvāṃ tu veditum icchāmi kathyatāṃ kāsi kasya vā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.16b: iha vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvam āgatā brūhi tattvataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.17b: śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi tattvārthaṃ vacanaṃ mama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.19a: rāvaṇo nāma me bhrātā rākṣaso rākṣaseśvaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.20a: vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā na tu rākṣasaceṣṭitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.20c: tān ahaṃ samatikrāntā rāma tvā pūrvadarśanāt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.21b: cirāya bhava bhartā me sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.22a: vikṛtā ca virūpā ca na seyaṃ sadṛśī tava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.22b: aham evānurūpā te bhāryā rūpeṇa paśya mām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.23b: anena saha te bhrātrā bhakṣayiṣyāmi mānuṣīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.24b: paśyan saha mayā kānta daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_16.25a: ity evam uktaḥ kākutsthaḥ prahasya madirekṣaṇām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.3a: anujas tv eṣa me bhrātā śīlavān priyadarśanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.3b: śrīmān akṛtadāraś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.4b: anurūpaś ca te bhartā rūpasyāsya bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.5a: enaṃ bhaja viśālākṣi bhartāraṃ bhrātaraṃ mama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.6a: iti rāmeṇa sā proktā rākṣasī kāmamohitā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.6b: visṛjya rāmaṃ sahasā tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.7a: asya rūpasya te yuktā bhāryāhaṃ varavarṇinī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.7b: mayā saha sukhaṃ sarvān daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.8a: evam uktas tu saumitrī rākṣasyā vākyakovidaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.8b: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhīṃ smitvā lakṣmaṇo yuktam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.9a: kathaṃ dāsasya me dāsī bhāryā bhavitum icchasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.10b: āryasya tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā bhava yavīyasī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.11b: bhāryāṃ vṛddhāṃ parityajya tvām evaiṣa bhajiṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.12a: ko hi rūpam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ saṃtyajya varavarṇini /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.15b: vṛddhāṃ bhāryām avaṣṭabhya na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.18b: nigṛhya rāmaḥ kupitas tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.19b: na kāryaḥ paśya vaidehīṃ kathaṃcit saumya jīvatīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.21a: ity ukto lakṣmaṇas tasyāḥ kruddho rāmasya paśyataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.22a: nikṛttakarṇanāsā tu visvaraṃ sā vinadya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.23b: nanāda vividhān nādān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.24c: tatas tu sā rākṣasasaṃghasaṃvṛtaṃ kharaṃ janasthānagataṃ virūpitā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.24d: upetya taṃ bhrātaram ugratejasaṃ papāta bhūmau gaganād yathāśaniḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.24e: tataḥ sabhāryaṃ bhayamohamūrchitā salakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavam āgataṃ vanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_17.24f: virūpaṇaṃ cātmani śoṇitokṣitā śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.1a: tāṃ tathā patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā virūpāṃ śoṇitokṣitām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.2b: imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ kenāntakasamā gatā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.3b: ko 'yam evaṃ mahāvīryas tvāṃ virūpāṃ cakāra ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.4a: na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ loke yaḥ kuryān mama vipriyam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.5b: salile kṣīram āsaktaṃ niṣpibann iva sārasaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.6b: saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktaṃ medinī kasya pāsyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.7a: kasya pattrarathāḥ kāyān māṃsam utkṛtya saṃgatāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.8a: taṃ na devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.9a: upalabhya śanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.9b: yena tvaṃ durvinītena vane vikramya nirjitā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.10a: iti bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhasya ca viśeṣataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.10b: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ sabāṣpam idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.12b: devau vā mānuṣau vā tau na tarkayitum utsahe // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.13b: dṛṣṭā tatra mayā nārī tayor madhye sumadhyamā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.14a: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ sambhūya pramadām adhikṛtya tām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.15a: tasyāś cānṛjuvṛttāyās tayoś ca hatayor aham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.16a: eṣa me prathamaḥ kāmaḥ kṛtas tāta tvayā bhavet /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.16b: tasyās tayoś ca rudhiraṃ pibeyam aham āhave // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.19a: tau hatvā tāṃ ca durvṛttām upāvartitum arhatha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.19b: iyaṃ ca rudhiraṃ teṣāṃ bhaginī mama pāsyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.20b: śīghraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ gatvā tau pramathya svatejasā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_18.21b: tatra jagmus tayā sārdhaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.1b: rakṣasām ācacakṣe tau bhrātarau saha sītayā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.2b: dadṛśuḥ sītayā sārdhaṃ vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.3a: tān dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmān āgatāṃ tāṃ ca rākṣasīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.4b: imān asyā vadhiṣyāmi padavīm āgatān iha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.5a: vākyam etat tataḥ śrutvā rāmasya viditātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.6b: cakāra sajyaṃ dharmātmā tāni rakṣāṃsi cābravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.10b: yadi prāṇair ihārtho vo nivartadhvaṃ niśācarāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.11a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te caturdaśa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.13a: krodham utpādya no bhartuḥ kharasya sumahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.13b: tvam eva hāsyase prāṇān adyāsmābhir hato yudhi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.14a: kā hi te śaktir ekasya bahūnāṃ raṇamūrdhani /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.14b: asmākam agrataḥ sthātuṃ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.15b: prāṇāṃs tyakṣyasi vīryaṃ ca dhanuś ca karapīḍitam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.15c: ity evam uktvā saṃrabdhā rākṣasās te caturdaśa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.16b: cikṣipus tāni śūlāni rāghavaṃ prati durjayam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.19a: gṛhītvā dhanur āyamya lakṣyān uddiśya rākṣasān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.19b: mumoca rāghavo bāṇān vajrān iva śatakratuḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.21a: te bhittvā rakṣasāṃ vegād vakṣāṃsi rudhirāplutāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.22a: te bhinnahṛdayā bhūmau chinnamūlā iva drumāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.23a: tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.23b: paritrastā punas tatra vyasṛjad bhairavaṃ ravam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.23c: sā nadantī mahānādaṃ javāc chūrpaṇakhā punaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.24a: upagamya kharaṃ sā tu kiṃcit saṃśuṣkaśoṇitā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.24c: nipātitān prekṣya raṇe tu rākṣasān pradhāvitā śūrpaṇakhā punas tataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_19.24d: vadhaṃ ca teṣāṃ nikhilena rakṣasāṃ śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.1a: sa punaḥ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāc chūrpaṇakhāṃ kharaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.1b: uvāca vyaktayā vācā tām anarthārtham āgatām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.2a: mayā tv idānīṃ śūrās te rākṣasā rudhirāśanāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.3a: bhaktāś caivānuraktāś ca hitāś ca mama nityaśaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.3b: ghnanto 'pi na nihantavyā na na kuryur vaco mama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.4a: kim etac chrotum icchāmi kāraṇaṃ yatkṛte punaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.4b: hā nātheti vinardantī sarpavad veṣṭase kṣitau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.5a: anāthavad vilapasi kiṃ nu nāthe mayi sthite /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.5b: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha mā bhaiṣīr vaiklavyaṃ tyajyatām iha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.6a: ity evam uktā durdharṣā khareṇa parisāntvitā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.6b: vimṛjya nayane sāsre kharaṃ bhrātaram abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.7a: preṣitāś ca tvayā śūrā rākṣasās te caturdaśa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.9a: tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇenaiva mahābalān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.9b: rāmasya ca mahat karma mahāṃs trāso 'bhavan mama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.10a: sāsmi bhītā samudvignā viṣaṇṇā ca niśācara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.10b: śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ punaḥ prāptā sarvato bhayadarśinī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.11b: kiṃ māṃ na trāyase magnāṃ vipule śokasāgare // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.12a: ete ca nihatā bhūmau rāmeṇa niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.12b: ye ca me padavīṃ prāptā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.12c: mayi te yady anukrośo yadi rakṣaḥsu teṣu ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.13a: rāmeṇa yadi śaktis te tejo vāsti niśācara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.14a: yadi rāmaṃ mamāmitram adya tvaṃ na vadhiṣyasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.15a: buddhyāham anupaśyāmi na tvaṃ rāmasya saṃyuge /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.16b: mānuṣau yan na śaknoṣi hantuṃ tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.17b: niḥsattvasyālpavīryasya vāsas te kīdṛśas tv iha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_20.18b: bhrātā cāsya mahāvīryo yena cāsmi virūpitā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.1a: evam ādharṣitaḥ śūraḥ śūrpaṇakhyā kharas tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.1b: uvāca rakṣasāṃ madhye kharaḥ kharataraṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.3a: na rāmaṃ gaṇaye vīryān mānuṣaṃ kṣīṇajīvitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.3b: ātmā duścaritaiḥ prāṇān hato yo 'dya vimokṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.4a: bāṣpaḥ saṃhriyatām eṣa sambhramaś ca vimucyatām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.4b: ahaṃ rāmaṃ saha bhrātrā nayāmi yamasādanam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.5b: rāmasya rudhiraṃ raktam uṣṇaṃ pāsyasi rākṣasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.6a: sā prahṛṣṭā vacaḥ śrutvā kharasya vadanāc cyutam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.6b: praśaśaṃsa punar maurkhyād bhrātaraṃ rakṣasāṃ varam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.7a: tayā paruṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ punar eva praśaṃsitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.7b: abravīd dūṣaṇaṃ nāma kharaḥ senāpatiṃ tadā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.11a: upasthāpaya me kṣipraṃ rathaṃ saumya dhanūṃṣi ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.11b: śarāṃś ca citrān khaḍgāṃś ca śaktīś ca vividhāḥ śitāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.15a: matsyaiḥ puṣpair drumaiḥ śailaiś candrasūryaiś ca kāñcanaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.15b: māṅgalyaiḥ pakṣisaṃghaiś ca tārābhiś ca samāvṛtam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.20a: mudgaraiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.20b: khaḍgaiś cakraiś ca hastasthair bhrājamānaiś ca tomaraiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.21a: śaktibhiḥ parighair ghorair atimātraiś ca kārmukaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.23a: tāṃs tv abhidravato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān bhīmavikramān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.25a: sa codito rathaḥ śīghraṃ kharasya ripughātinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.25c: pravṛddhamanyus tu kharaḥ kharasvano ripor vadhārthaṃ tvarito yathāntakaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_21.25d: acūcudat sārathim unnadan punar mahābalo megha ivāśmavarṣavān //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.1a: tat prayātaṃ balaṃ ghoram aśivaṃ śoṇitodakam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.6a: vyājahruś ca pradīptāyāṃ diśi vai bhairavasvanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.7b: ākāśaṃ tad anākāśaṃ cakrur bhīmā balāhakāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.8b: diśo vā vidiśo vāpi suvyaktaṃ na cakāśire // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.9b: kharasyābhimukhaṃ nedus tadā ghorā mṛgāḥ khagāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.12b: utpetuś ca vinā rātriṃ tārāḥ khadyotasaprabhāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.13b: tasmin kṣaṇe babhūvuś ca vinā puṣpaphalair drumāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.14a: uddhūtaś ca vinā vātaṃ reṇur jaladharāruṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.17b: lalāṭe ca rujā jātā na ca mohān nyavartata // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.18b: abravīd rākṣasān sarvān prahasan sa kharas tadā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.19b: na cintayāmy ahaṃ vīryād balavān durbalān iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.20a: tārā api śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayeyaṃ nabhastalāt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.21a: rāghavaṃ taṃ balotsiktaṃ bhrātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.22a: sakāmā bhaginī me 'stu pītvā tu rudhiraṃ tayoḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.23a: na kvacit prāptapūrvo me saṃyugeṣu parājayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.23b: yuṣmākam etat pratyakṣaṃ nānṛtaṃ kathayāmy aham // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.24b: vajrahastaṃ raṇe hanyāṃ kiṃ punas tau ca mānuṣau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.25a: sā tasya garjitaṃ śrutvā rākṣasasya mahācamūḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.26b: ṛṣayo devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.27b: svasti gobrāhmaṇebhyo 'stu lokānāṃ ye ca saṃmatāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.29a: etac cānyac ca bahuśo bruvāṇāḥ paramarṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.30a: rathena tu kharo vegāt sainyasyāgrād viniḥsṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.30b: taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ bhūyo rākṣasāś ca viniḥsṛtāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_22.33d: tau rājaputrau sahasābhyupetā mālā grahāṇām iva candrasūryau //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.1b: tān evautpātikān rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā dadarśa ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.2b: prajānām ahitān dṛṣṭvā vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.5a: sadhūmāś ca śarāḥ sarve mama yuddhābhinandinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.6b: agrato no bhayaṃ prāptaṃ saṃśayo jīvitasya ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.7a: samprahāras tu sumahān bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.7b: ayam ākhyāti me bāhuḥ sphuramāṇo muhur muhuḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.8a: saṃnikarṣe tu naḥ śūra jayaṃ śatroḥ parājayam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.8b: suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca tava vaktraṃ hi lakṣyate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.9a: udyatānāṃ hi yuddhārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.12a: pratikūlitum icchāmi na hi vākyam idaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.12b: śāpito mama pādābhyāṃ gamyatāṃ vatsa māciram // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.13a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.13b: śarān ādāya cāpaṃ ca guhāṃ durgāṃ samāśrayat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.14a: tasmin praviṣṭe tu guhāṃ lakṣmaṇe saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.14b: hanta niryuktam ity uktvā rāmaḥ kavacam āviśat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.16a: sa cāpam udyamya mahac charān ādāya vīryavān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.17a: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.18b: ekaś ca rāmo dharmātmā kathaṃ yuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.21b: teṣāṃ sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ pūrayāmāsa tad vanam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.23a: tat tv anīkaṃ mahāvegaṃ rāmaṃ samupasarpata /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.25a: vitatya ca dhanur bhīmaṃ tūṇyāś coddhṛtya sāyakān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.26a: duṣprekṣyaḥ so 'bhavat kruddho yugāntāgnir iva jvalan /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_23.27a: tasya kruddhasya rūpaṃ tu rāmasya dadṛśe tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.2a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā saguṇaṃ cāpam udyamya kharaniḥsvanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.3b: yatra rāmo mahābāhur eko dhunvan dhanuḥ sthitaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.4a: taṃ tu niṣpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te rajanīcarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.5a: sa teṣāṃ yātudhānānāṃ madhye rato gataḥ kharaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.6a: tatas taṃ bhīmadhanvānaṃ kruddhāḥ sarve niśācarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.7a: mudgarair āyasaiḥ śūlaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.9a: te rāme śaravarṣāṇi vyasṛjan rakṣasāṃ guṇāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.10a: sa taiḥ parivṛto ghorai rāghavo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.10b: tithiṣv iva mahādevo vṛtaḥ pāriṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.11a: tāni muktāni śastrāṇi yātudhānaiḥ sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.12a: sa taiḥ praharaṇair ghorair bhinnagātro na vivyathe /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.12b: rāmaḥ pradīptair bahubhir vajrair iva mahācalaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.14b: ekaṃ sahasrair bahubhis tadā dṛṣṭvā samāvṛtam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.17a: te śarāḥ śatrusainyeṣu muktā rāmeṇa līlayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.17b: ādadū rakṣasāṃ prāṇān pāśāḥ kālakṛtā iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.18a: bhittvā rākṣasadehāṃs tāṃs te śarā rudhirāplutāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.20a: tair dhanūṃṣi dhvajāgrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.22a: tat sainyaṃ niśitair bāṇair arditaṃ marmabhedibhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.22b: rāmeṇa na sukhaṃ lebhe śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.23a: kecid bhīmabalāḥ śūrāḥ śūlān khaḍgān paraśvadhān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.24a: tāni bāṇair mahābāhuḥ śastrāṇy āvārya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.24b: jahāra samare prāṇāṃś cicheda ca śirodharān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.25a: avaśiṣṭāś ca ye tatra viṣaṇṇāś ca niśācarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.26a: tān sarvān punar ādāya samāśvāsya ca dūṣaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_24.28b: rāmasyāsya mahāghoraṃ punas teṣāṃ ca rakṣasām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.1a: tad drumāṇāṃ śilānāṃ ca varṣaṃ prāṇaharaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.2a: pratigṛhya ca tad varaṃ nimīlita ivarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.2b: rāmaḥ krodhaṃ paraṃ bheje vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.9a: sa karābhyāṃ vikīrṇābhyāṃ papāta bhuvi dūṣaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.10a: dṛṣṭvā taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau dūṣaṇaṃ nihataṃ raṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.10b: sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ sarvabhūtāny apūjayan // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.12b: sthūlākṣaḥ paṭṭiśaṃ gṛhya pramāthī ca paraśvadham // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.13a: dṛṣṭvaivāpatatas tāṃs tu rāghavaḥ sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.15b: sa papāta hato bhūmau viṭapīva mahādrumaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.17a: te rukmapuṅkhā viśikhāḥ sadhūmā iva pāvakāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.17b: nijaghnus tāni rakṣāṃsi vajrā iva mahādrumān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.18a: rakṣasāṃ tu śataṃ rāmaḥ śatenaikena karṇinā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.20b: āstīrṇā vasudhā kṛtsnā mahāvediḥ kuśair iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.23a: tasya sainyasya sarvasya kharaḥ śeṣo mahārathaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.23b: rākṣasas triśirāś caiva rāmaś ca ripusūdanaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.23c: tatas tu tad bhīmabalaṃ mahāhave samīkṣya rāmeṇa hataṃ balīyasā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_25.23d: rathena rāmaṃ mahatā kharas tataḥ samāsasādendra ivodyatāśaniḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.3a: pratijānāmi te satyam āyudhaṃ cāham ālabhe /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.4a: ahaṃ vāsya raṇe mṛtyur eṣa vā samare mama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.5a: prahṛṣṭo vā hate rāme janasthānaṃ prayāsyasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.7b: abhyadravad raṇe rāmaṃ triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.11a: tatas triśirasā bāṇair lalāṭe tāḍitas tribhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.11b: amarṣī kupito rāmaḥ saṃrabdham idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.12a: puṣpair iva śarair yasya lalāṭe 'smi parikṣataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.13a: evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaḥ śarān āśīviṣopamān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.15b: rāmaś cicheda bāṇena dhvajaṃ cāsya samucchritam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.16b: bibheda rāmas taṃ bāṇair hṛdaye so 'bhavaj jaḍaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.17b: śirāṃsy apātayat trīṇi vegavadbhis tribhiḥ śataiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.19b: dravanti sma na tiṣṭhanti vyāghratrastā mṛgā iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_26.20a: tān kharo dravato dṛṣṭvā nivartya ruṣitaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.1a: nihataṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe triśirasā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.1b: kharasyāpy abhavat trāso dṛṣṭvā rāmasya vikramam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.2a: sa dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ sainyam aviṣahyaṃ mahābalam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.2b: hatam ekena rāmeṇa dūṣaṇas triśirā api // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.3a: tad balaṃ hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ vimanāḥ prekṣya rākṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.3b: āsasāda kharo rāmaṃ namucir vāsavaṃ yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.4b: kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya kruddhān āśīviṣān iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.5b: cacāra samare mārgāñ śarai rathagataḥ kharaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.6a: sa sarvāś ca diśo bāṇaiḥ pradiśaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.6b: pūrayāmāsa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo 'pi sumahad dhanuḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.9a: śarajālāvṛtaḥ sūryo na tadā sma prakāśate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.10b: ājaghāna raṇe rāmaṃ totrair iva mahādvipam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.12b: dṛṣṭvā nodvijate rāmaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.13b: āsasāda raṇe rāmaṃ pataṃga iva pāvakam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.15a: sa punas tv aparān sapta śarān ādāya varmaṇi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.16a: tatas tat prahataṃ bāṇaiḥ kharamuktaiḥ suparvabhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.17a: sa śarair arpitaḥ kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.17b: rarāja samare rāmo vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.18b: cakārāntāya sa ripoḥ sajyam anyan mahad dhanuḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.19a: sumahad vaiṣṇavaṃ yat tad atisṛṣṭaṃ maharṣiṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.19b: varaṃ tad dhanur udyamya kharaṃ samabhidhāvata // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.20b: cicheda rāmaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ kharasya samare dhvajam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.21a: sa darśanīyo bahudhā vicchinnaḥ kāñcano dhvajaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.22a: taṃ caturbhiḥ kharaḥ kruddho rāmaṃ gātreṣu mārgaṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.22b: vivyādha hṛdi marmajño mātaṃgam iva tomaraiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.24a: sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya paramāhave /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.25a: śirasy ekena bāṇena dvābhyāṃ bāhvor athārpayat /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.25b: tribhiś candrārdhavaktraiś ca vakṣasy abhijaghāna ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.27a: tato 'sya yugam ekena caturbhiś caturo hayān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.27b: ṣaṣṭhena ca śiraḥ saṃkhye cicheda kharasāratheḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.28.1a: tribhis triveṇuṃ balavān dvābhyām akṣaṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.28.1b: dvādaśena tu bāṇena kharasya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.29b: gadāpāṇir avaplutya tasthau bhūmau kharas tadā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.30a: tat karma rāmasya mahārathasya sametya devāś ca maharṣayaś ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_27.30b: apūjayan prāñjalayaḥ prahṛṣṭās tadā vimānāgragatāḥ sametāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.1a: kharaṃ tu virathaṃ rāmo gadāpāṇim avasthitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.3b: trayāṇām api lokānām īśvaro 'pi na tiṣṭhati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.4b: tīkṣṇaṃ sarvajano hanti sarpaṃ duṣṭam ivāgatam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.5a: lobhāt pāpāni kurvāṇaḥ kāmād vā yo na budhyate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.5b: bhraṣṭaḥ paśyati tasyāntaṃ brāhmaṇī karakād iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.6b: kiṃ nu hatvā mahābhāgān phalaṃ prāpsyasi rākṣasa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.7b: aiśvaryaṃ prāpya tiṣṭhanti śīrṇamūlā iva drumāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.8a: avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.8b: ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpam ivārtavam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.9a: nacirāt prāpyate loke pāpānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.10b: aham āsādito rājā prāṇān hantuṃ niśācara // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.11a: adya hi tvāṃ mayā muktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.13a: adya tvāṃ nihataṃ bāṇaiḥ paśyantu paramarṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.13b: nirayasthaṃ vimānasthā ye tvayā hiṃsitāḥ purā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.14a: prahara tvaṃ yathākāmaṃ kuru yatnaṃ kulādhama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.14b: adya te pātayiṣyāmi śiras tālaphalaṃ yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.15a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.17a: vikrāntā balavanto vā ye bhavanti nararṣabhāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.17b: kathayanti na te kiṃcit tejasā svena garvitāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.19b: mṛtyukāle hi samprāpte svayam aprastave stavam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.20a: sarvathā tu laghutvaṃ te katthanena vidarśitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.21a: na tu mām iha tiṣṭhantaṃ paśyasi tvaṃ gadādharam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.22a: paryāpto 'haṃ gadāpāṇir hantuṃ prāṇān raṇe tava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.23a: kāmaṃ bahv api vaktavyaṃ tvayi vakṣyāmi na tv aham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.23b: astaṃ gaccheddhi savitā yuddhavighnas tato bhavet // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.25a: ity uktvā paramakruddhas tāṃ gadāṃ paramāṅgadaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.25b: kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya pradīptām aśaniṃ yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.26b: bhasma vṛkṣāṃś ca gulmāṃś ca kṛtvāgāt tatsamīpataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_28.28a: sā viśīrṇā śarair bhinnā papāta dharaṇītale /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.1a: bhittvā tu tāṃ gadāṃ bāṇai rāghavo dharmavatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.1b: smayamānaḥ kharaṃ vākyaṃ saṃrabdham idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.4b: rākṣasānāṃ karomīti mithyā tad api te vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.7b: svapsyase gāṃ samāśliṣya durlabhāṃ pramadām iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.11b: anurūpakulāḥ patnyo yāsāṃ tvaṃ patir īdṛśaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.12b: tvatkṛte śaṅkitair agnau munibhiḥ pātyate haviḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.13a: tam evam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rāghavaṃ raṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.14a: dṛḍhaṃ khalv avalipto 'si bhayeṣv api ca nirbhayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.14b: vācyāvācyaṃ tato hi tvaṃ mṛtyuvaśyo na budhyase // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.16a: evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ saṃrudhya bhrukuṭiṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.18b: rāmam uddiśya cikṣepa hatas tvam iti cābravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.19a: tam āpatantaṃ bāṇaughaiś chittvā rāmaḥ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.19b: roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ nihantuṃ samare kharam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.21a: tasya bāṇāntarād raktaṃ bahu susrāva phenilam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.22a: vihvalaḥ sa kṛto bāṇaiḥ kharo rāmeṇa saṃyuge /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.25a: sa tad dattaṃ maghavatā surarājena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.25b: saṃdadhe ca sa dharmātmā mumoca ca kharaṃ prati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.27a: sa papāta kharo bhūmau dahyamānaḥ śarāgninā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.28a: sa vṛtra iva vajreṇa phenena namucir yathā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.29b: sabhājya muditā rāmam idaṃ vacanam abruvan // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.31a: ānītas tvam imaṃ deśam upāyena maharṣibhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.32a: tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā daśarathātmaja /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.33a: etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_29.34a: tato rāmas tu vijayī pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_30.2a: dūṣaṇaṃ ca kharaṃ caiva hataṃ triśirasaṃ raṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_30.3a: sā dṛṣṭvā karma rāmasya kṛtam anyaiḥ suduṣkaram /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_30.13a: purīṃ bhogavatīṃ gatvā parājitya ca vāsukim /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_30.13b: takṣakasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ parājitya jahāra yaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_30.14b: vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tasya kāmagaṃ vai jahāra yaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_30.15a: vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ divyaṃ nalinīṃ nandanaṃ vanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_30.17b: purā svayambhuve dhīraḥ śirāṃsy upajahāra yaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_30.18b: abhayaṃ yasya saṃgrāme mṛtyuto mānuṣād ṛte // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_30.20c: rākṣasī bhrātaraṃ krūraṃ sā dadarśa mahābalam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_30.22b: sudāruṇaṃ vākyam abhītacāriṇī mahātmanā śūrpaṇakhā virūpitā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.3b: lubdhaṃ na bahu manyante śmaśānāgnim iva prajāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.4a: svayaṃ kāryāṇi yaḥ kāle nānutiṣṭhati pārthivaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.4b: sa tu vai saha rājyena taiś ca kāryair vinaśyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.5b: varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkam iva dvipāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.6a: ye na rakṣanti viṣayam asvādhīnā narādhipāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.6b: te na vṛddhyā prakāśante girayaḥ sāgare yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.8a: yeṣāṃ cāraś ca kośaś ca nayaś ca jayatāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.8b: asvādhīnā narendrāṇāṃ prākṛtais te janaiḥ samāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.9a: yasmāt paśyanti dūrasthān sarvān arthān narādhipāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.10a: ayuktacāraṃ manye tvāṃ prākṛtaiḥ sacivair vṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.10b: svajanaṃ ca janasthānaṃ hataṃ yo nāvabudhyase // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.11b: hatāny ekena rāmeṇa kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.12a: ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.13a: tvaṃ tu lubdhaḥ pramattaś ca parādhīnaś ca rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.13b: viṣaye sve samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ yo nāvabudhyase // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.16a: nānutiṣṭhati kāryāṇi bhayeṣu na bibheti ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.16b: kṣipraṃ rājyāc cyuto dīnas tṛṇais tulyo bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.17a: śuṣkakāṣṭhair bhavet kāryaṃ loṣṭair api ca pāṃsubhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.17b: na tu sthānāt paribhraṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ syād vasudhādhipaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.18a: upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.19a: apramattaś ca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.19b: kṛtajño dharmaśīlaś ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.20b: vyaktakrodhaprasādaś ca sa rājā pūjyate janaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.21a: tvaṃ tu rāvaṇa durbuddhir guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.21b: yasya te 'viditaś cārai rakṣasāṃ sumahān vadhaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.21d: ayuktabuddhir guṇadoṣaniścaye vipannarājyo na cirād vipatsyate //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.21e: iti svadoṣān parikīrtitāṃs tayā samīkṣya buddhyā kṣaṇadācareśvaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_31.21f: dhanena darpeṇa balena cānvito vicintayāmāsa ciraṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.1a: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāṃ kruddhāṃ bruvatīṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.2a: kaś ca rāmaḥ kathaṃvīryaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ kiṃparākramaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.3a: āyudhaṃ kiṃ ca rāmasya nihatā yena rākṣasāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.3b: kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.6b: dīptān kṣipati nārācān sarpān iva mahāviṣān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.7a: nādadānaṃ śarān ghorān na muñcantaṃ mahābalam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.7b: na kārmukaṃ vikarṣantaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi saṃyuge // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.8a: hanyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ paśyāmi śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.10b: ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.12b: anuraktaś ca bhaktaś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.13a: amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.13b: rāmasya dakṣiṇo bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.15a: naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.16a: yasya sītā bhaved bhāryā yaṃ ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajet /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.16b: atijīvet sa sarveṣu lokeṣv api puraṃdarāt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.17b: tavānurūpā bhāryā sā tvaṃ ca tasyās tathā patiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.19b: manmathasya śarāṇāṃ ca tvaṃ vidheyo bhaviṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.20a: yadi tasyām abhiprāyo bhāryārthe tava jāyate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.20b: śīghram uddhriyatāṃ pādo jayārtham iha dakṣiṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.21a: kuru priyaṃ tathā teṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ rākṣaseśvara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.22a: taṃ śarair niśitair hatvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.23a: rocate yadi te vākyaṃ mamaitad rākṣaseśvara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.24a: niśamya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagair hatāñ janasthānagatān niśācarān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_32.24b: kharaṃ ca buddhvā nihataṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ tvam adya kṛtyaṃ pratipattum arhasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.1b: sacivān abhyanujñāya kāryaṃ buddhvā jagāma ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.2a: tat kāryam anugamyātha yathāvad upalabhya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.2b: doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca sampradhārya balābalam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.3a: iti kartavyam ity eva kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.3b: sthirabuddhis tato ramyāṃ yānaśālāṃ jagāma ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.13b: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca tarubhiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.14b: nāgaiḥ suparṇair gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca sahasraśaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.15a: jitakāmaiś ca siddhaiś ca cāraṇaiś copaśobhitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.22a: agarūṇāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vanāny upavanāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.22b: takkolānāṃ ca jātyānāṃ phalānāṃ ca sugandhinām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.23a: puṣpāṇi ca tamālasya gulmāni maricasya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.24b: kāñcanāni ca śailāni rājatāni ca sarvaśaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.27b: tatrāpaśyat sa meghābhaṃ nyagrodham ṛṣibhir vṛtam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.27c: samantād yasya tāḥ śākhāḥ śatayojanam āyatāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.28a: yasya hastinam ādāya mahākāyaṃ ca kacchapam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.29a: tasya tāṃ sahasā śākhāṃ bhāreṇa patagottamaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.30b: ajā babhūvur dhūmrāś ca saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.31a: teṣāṃ dayārthaṃ garuḍas tāṃ śākhāṃ śatayojanām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.36a: taṃ tu gatvā paraṃ pāraṃ samudrasya nadīpateḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.38a: sa rāvaṇaḥ samāgamya vidhivat tena rakṣasā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_33.38b: tataḥ paścād idaṃ vākyam abravīd vākyakovidaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.1a: mārīca śrūyatāṃ tāta vacanaṃ mama bhāṣataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.1b: ārto 'smi mama cārtasya bhavān hi paramā gatiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.2a: jānīṣe tvaṃ janasthānaṃ bhrātā yatra kharo mama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.2b: dūṣaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ svasā śūrpaṇakhā ca me // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.3b: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā labdhalakṣā niśācarāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.6a: te tv idānīṃ janasthāne vasamānā mahābalāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.6b: saṃgatāḥ param āyattā rāmeṇa saha saṃyuge // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.7b: anuktvā paruṣaṃ kiṃcic charair vyāpāritaṃ dhanuḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.9a: kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.9b: hatvā triśirasaṃ cāpi nirbhayā daṇḍakāḥ kṛtāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.10b: sa hantā tasya sainyasya rāmaḥ kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.11b: tyaktadharmas tv adharmātmā bhūtānām ahite rataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.12a: yena vairaṃ vināraṇye sattvam āśritya kevalam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.13b: ānayiṣyāmi vikramya sahāyas tatra me bhava // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.14a: tvayā hy ahaṃ sahāyena pārśvasthena mahābala /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.14b: bhrātṛbhiś ca surān yuddhe samagrān nābhicintaye // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.15a: tat sahāyo bhava tvaṃ me samartho hy asi rākṣasa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.15b: vīrye yuddhe ca darpe ca na hy asti sadṛśas tava // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.16b: śṛṇu tat karma sāhāyye yat kāryaṃ vacanān mama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.17a: sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.17b: āśrame tasya rāmasya sītāyāḥ pramukhe cara // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.18a: tvāṃ tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ sītā dṛṣṭvā tu mṛgarūpiṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.19a: tatas tayor apāye tu śūnye sītāṃ yathāsukham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.21b: śuṣkaṃ samabhavad vaktraṃ paritrasto babhūva ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_34.21d: kṛtāñjalis tattvam uvāca vākyaṃ hitaṃ ca tasmai hitam ātmanaś ca //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.2b: apriyasya ca pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.3a: na nūnaṃ budhyase rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ guṇonnatam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.4a: api svasti bhavet tāta sarveṣāṃ bhuvi rakṣasām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.4b: api rāmo na saṃkruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.5b: api sītā nimittaṃ ca na bhaved vyasanaṃ mahat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.6a: api tvām īśvaraṃ prāpya kāmavṛttaṃ niraṅkuśam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.6b: na vinaśyet purī laṅkā tvayā saha sarākṣasā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.7b: ātmānaṃ svajanaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sa rājā hanti durmatiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.8a: na ca pitrā parityakto nāmaryādaḥ kathaṃcana /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.8b: na lubdho na ca duḥśīlo na ca kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.9b: na ca tīkṣṇo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.11b: hitvā rājyaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.12a: na rāmaḥ karkaśas tāta nāvidvān nājitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.12b: anṛtaṃ na śrutaṃ caiva naiva tvaṃ vaktum arhasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.13b: rājā sarvasya lokasya devānām iva vāsavaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.14a: kathaṃ tvaṃ tasya vaidehīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.14b: icchasi prasabhaṃ hartuṃ prabhām iva vivasvataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.15b: rāmāgniṃ sahasā dīptaṃ na praveṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.17a: rājyaṃ sukhaṃ ca saṃtyajya jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.18a: aprameyaṃ hi tattejo yasya sā janakātmajā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.18b: na tvaṃ samarthas tāṃ hartuṃ rāmacāpāśrayāṃ vane // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.19c: kim udyamaṃ vyartham imaṃ kṛtvā te rākṣasādhipa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.20a: dṛṣṭaś cet tvaṃ raṇe tena tadantaṃ tava jīvitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.20b: jīvitaṃ ca sukhaṃ caiva rājyaṃ caiva sudurlabham // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.21b: mantrayitvā tu dharmiṣṭhaiḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.21c: doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca sampradhārya balābalam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.22a: ātmanaś ca balaṃ jñātvā rāghavasya ca tattvataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.22b: hitaṃ hi tava niścitya kṣamaṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.22c: ahaṃ tu manye tava na kṣamaṃ raṇe samāgamaṃ kosalarājasūnunā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_35.22d: idaṃ hi bhūyaḥ śṛṇu vākyam uttamaṃ kṣamaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca niśācarādhipa //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.1a: kadācid apy ahaṃ vīryāt paryaṭan pṛthivīm imām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.3b: svayaṃ gatvā daśarathaṃ narendram idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.4a: ayaṃ rakṣatu māṃ rāmaḥ parvakāle samāhitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.4b: mārīcān me bhayaṃ ghoraṃ samutpannaṃ nareśvara // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.5a: ity evam ukto dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.6a: kāmaṃ tu mama yat sainyaṃ mayā saha gamiṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.7a: ity evam uktaḥ sa munī rājānaṃ punar abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.7b: rāmān nānyad balaṃ loke paryāptaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.8a: bālo 'py eṣa mahātejāḥ samarthas tasya nigrahe /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.8b: gamiṣye rāmam ādāya svasti te 'stu paraṃtapa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.9a: ity evam uktvā sa munis tam ādāya nṛpātmajam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.10a: taṃ tadā daṇḍakāraṇye yajñam uddiśya dīkṣitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.14b: māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ sajyam asambhrāntaś cakāra ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.15a: avajānann ahaṃ mohād bālo 'yam iti rāghavam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.16a: tena muktas tato bāṇaḥ śitaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.17b: prāpya saṃjñāṃ cirāt tāta laṅkāṃ prati gataḥ purīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.18a: evam asmi tadā muktaḥ sahāyās te nipātitāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.19a: tan mayā vāryamāṇas tvaṃ yadi rāmeṇa vigraham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.19b: kariṣyasy āpadaṃ ghorāṃ kṣipraṃ prāpya naśiṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.21b: drakṣyasi tvaṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vinaṣṭāṃ maithilīkṛte // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.23b: drakṣyasy abhihatān bhūmau tava doṣāt tu rākṣasān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.24a: hṛtadārān sadārāṃś ca daśa vidravato diśaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.27a: mānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.27b: yadīcchasi ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mā kṛthā rāmavipriyam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_36.27c: nivāryamāṇaḥ suhṛdā mayā bhṛśaṃ prasahya sītāṃ yadi dharṣayiṣyasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.1a: evam asmi tadā muktaḥ kathaṃcit tena saṃyuge /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.1b: idānīm api yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yad uttaram // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.2a: rākṣasābhyām ahaṃ dvābhyām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.5b: rudhirāṇi pibaṃs teṣāṃ tathā māṃsāni bhakṣayan // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.7b: āsādayaṃ tadā rāmaṃ tāpasaṃ dharmam āśritam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.8a: vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.11a: tena muktās trayo bāṇāḥ śitāḥ śatrunibarhaṇāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.13b: samutkrāntas tato muktas tāv ubhau rākṣasau hatau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.14a: śareṇa mukto rāmasya kathaṃcit prāpya jīvitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.16b: rāmabhūtam idaṃ sarvam araṇyaṃ pratibhāti me // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.17a: rāmam eva hi paśyāmi rahite rākṣaseśvara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.18b: ratnāni ca rathāś caiva trāsaṃ saṃjanayanti me // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.18c: ahaṃ tasya prabhāvajño na yuddhaṃ tena te kṣamam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.19a: raṇe rāmeṇa yudhyasva kṣamāṃ vā kuru rākṣasa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.19b: na te rāmakathā kāryā yadi māṃ draṣṭum icchasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.19c: idaṃ vaco bandhuhitārthinā mayā yathocyamānaṃ yadi nābhipatsyase /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_37.19d: sabāndhavas tyakṣyasi jīvitaṃ raṇe hato 'dya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagaiḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.1a: mārīcena tu tad vākyaṃ kṣamaṃ yuktaṃ ca rāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.3a: yat kilaitad ayuktārthaṃ mārīca mayi kathyate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.3b: vākyaṃ niṣphalam atyarthaṃ bījam uptam ivoṣare // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.4a: tvadvākyair na tu māṃ śakyaṃ bhettuṃ rāmasya saṃyuge /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.5a: yas tyaktvā suhṛdo rājyaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.5b: strīvākyaṃ prākṛtaṃ śrutvā vanam ekapade gataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.6a: avaśyaṃ tu mayā tasya saṃyuge kharaghātinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.6b: prāṇaiḥ priyatarā sītā hartavyā tava saṃnidhau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.7a: evaṃ me niścitā buddhir hṛdi mārīca vartate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.7b: na vyāvartayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.8a: doṣaṃ guṇaṃ vā saṃpṛṣṭas tvam evaṃ vaktum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.8b: apāyaṃ vāpy upāyaṃ vā kāryasyāsya viniścaye // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.9b: udyatāñjalinā rājño ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.10a: vākyam apratikūlaṃ tu mṛdupūrvaṃ śubhaṃ hitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.11a: sāvamardaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ mārīca hitam ucyate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.12a: agner indrasya somasya yamasya varuṇasya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.12b: auṣṇyaṃ tathā vikramaṃ ca saumyaṃ daṇḍaṃ prasannatām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.13a: tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāś ca pārthivāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.13b: tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ moham āsthitaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.14a: guṇadoṣau na pṛcchāmi kṣamaṃ cātmani rākṣasa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.14b: asmiṃs tu sa bhavān kṛtye sāhāyyaṃ kartum arhasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.15a: sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.16a: tvāṃ tu māyāmṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāñcanaṃ jātavismayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.16b: ānayainam iti kṣipraṃ rāmaṃ vakṣyati maithilī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.17a: apakrānte ca kākutsthe lakṣmaṇe ca yathāsukham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.18a: evaṃ kṛtvā tv idaṃ kāryaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha rākṣasa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.18c: gaccha saumya śivaṃ mārgaṃ kāryasyāsya vivṛddhaye /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.19a: prāpya sītām ayuddhena vañcayitvā tu rāghavam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.19b: laṅkāṃ prati gamiṣyāmi kṛtakāryaḥ saha tvayā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.20a: etat kāryam avaśyaṃ me balād api kariṣyasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.20b: rājño hi pratikūlastho na jātu sukham edhate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.20c: āsādya taṃ jīvitasaṃśayas te mṛtyur dhruvo hy adya mayā virudhya /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_38.20d: etad yathāvat parigṛhya buddhyā yad atra pathyaṃ kuru tat tathā tvam //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.3a: kas tvayā sukhinā rājan nābhinandati pāpakṛt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.5b: yas tvām icchati naśyantaṃ svakṛtena niśācara // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.6a: vadhyāḥ khalu na hanyante sacivās tava rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.6b: ye tvām utpatham ārūḍhaṃ na nigṛhṇanti sarvaśaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.7a: amātyaiḥ kāmavṛtto hi rājā kāpatham āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.7b: nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhir na nigrāhyo nigṛhyase // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.8a: dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yaśaś ca jayatāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.9a: viparyaye tu tat sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ bhavati rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.10a: rājamūlo hi dharmaś ca jayaś ca jayatāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.11a: rājyaṃ pālayituṃ śakyaṃ na tīkṣṇena niśācara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.12a: ye tīkṣṇamantrāḥ sacivā bhajyante saha tena vai /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.14b: rakṣyamāṇā na vardhante meṣā gomāyunā yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.15b: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.16a: tad idaṃ kākatālīyaṃ ghoram āsāditaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.16b: atra kiṃ śobhanaṃ yat tvaṃ sasainyo vinaśiṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.17a: māṃ nihatya tu rāmo 'sau nacirāt tvāṃ vadhiṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.17b: anena kṛtakṛtyo 'smi mriye yad ariṇā hataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.18a: darśanād eva rāmasya hataṃ mām upadhāraya /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.18b: ātmānaṃ ca hataṃ viddhi hṛtvā sītāṃ sabāndhavam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.19a: ānayiṣyāmi cet sītām āśramāt sahito mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.19b: naiva tvam asi naivāhaṃ naiva laṅkā na rākṣasāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.19c: nivāryamāṇas tu mayā hitaiṣiṇā na mṛṣyase vākyam idaṃ niśācara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_39.19d: paretakalpā hi gatāyuṣo narā hitaṃ na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhir īritam //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.1a: evam uktvā tu paruṣaṃ mārīco rāvaṇaṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.3a: kiṃ tu kartuṃ mayā śakyam evaṃ tvayi durātmani /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.3b: eṣa gacchāmy ahaṃ tāta svasti te 'stu niśācara // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.4a: prahṛṣṭas tv abhavat tena vacanena sa rākṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.5a: etac chauṇḍīryayuktaṃ te macchabdād iva bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.5b: idānīm asi mārīcaḥ pūrvam anyo niśācaraḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.6b: mayā saha ratho yuktaḥ piśācavadanaiḥ kharaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.7a: tato rāvaṇamārīcau vimānam iva taṃ ratham /
