GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.8a: tathaiva tatra paśyantau pattanāni vanāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.8b: girīṃś ca saritaḥ sarvā rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.10b: haste gṛhītvā mārīcaṃ rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.11b: kriyatāṃ tat sakhe śīghraṃ yadarthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.12a: sa rāvaṇavacaḥ śrutvā mārīco rākṣasas tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.17a: vanaṃ prajvalayan ramyaṃ rāmāśramapadaṃ ca tat /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.17b: manoharaṃ darśanīyaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā sa rākṣasaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.22a: punar gatvā nivṛttaś ca vicacāra mṛgottamaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.23a: vikrīḍaṃś ca punar bhūmau punar eva niṣīdati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.25b: samudvīkṣya ca sarve taṃ mṛgā ye 'nye vanecarāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.26b: rākṣasaḥ so 'pi tān vanyān mṛgān mṛgavadhe rataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.27b: tasminn eva tataḥ kāle vaidehī śubhalocanā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.28b: karṇikārān aśokāṃś ca cūtāṃś ca madirekṣaṇā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.31a: sa ca tāṃ rāmadayitāṃ paśyan māyāmayo mṛgaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_40.31b: vicacāra tatas tatra dīpayann iva tad vanam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.1a: sā taṃ samprekṣya suśroṇī kusumāni vicinvatī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.2b: bhartāram api cākrandal lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sāyudham // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.3b: vīkṣamāṇau tu taṃ deśaṃ tadā dadṛśatur mṛgam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.4a: śaṅkamānas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.4b: tam evainam ahaṃ manye mārīcaṃ rākṣasaṃ mṛgam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.6a: asya māyāvido māyā- mṛgarūpam idaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.7a: mṛgo hy evaṃvidho ratna- vicitro nāsti rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.7b: jagatyāṃ jagatīnātha māyaiṣā hi na saṃśayaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.10b: mṛgāś caranti sahitāś camarāḥ sṛmarās tathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.11a: ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca vānarāḥ kiṃnarās tathā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.12a: na cāsya sadṛśo rājan dṛṣṭapūrvo mṛgaḥ purā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.14a: aho rūpam aho lakṣmīḥ svarasampac ca śobhanā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.15a: yadi grahaṇam abhyeti jīvann eva mṛgas tava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.18a: jīvan na yadi te 'bhyeti grahaṇaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.20a: kāmavṛttam idaṃ raudraṃ strīṇām asadṛśaṃ matam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.20b: vapuṣā tv asya sattvasya vismayo janito mama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.22a: evaṃ sītāvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca mṛgam adbhutam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.22b: uvāca rāghavo hṛṣṭo bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.23a: paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ spṛhāṃ mṛgagatām imām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.23b: rūpaśreṣṭhatayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.24b: kutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ saumitre yo 'sya kaścit samo mṛgaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.26b: jihvāṃ mukhān niḥsarantīṃ meghād iva śatahradām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.27b: kasya nāmābhirūpo 'sau na mano lobhayen mṛgaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.28b: nānāratnamayaṃ divyaṃ na mano vismayaṃ vrajet // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.29a: māṃsahetor api mṛgān vihārārthaṃ ca dhanvinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.31a: tat sāram akhilaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanaṃ nicayavardhanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.31b: manasā cintitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā śukrasya lakṣmaṇa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.32b: tam artham arthaśāstrajñaḥ prāhur arthyāś ca lakṣmaṇa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.34a: na kādalī na priyakī na praveṇī na cāvikī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.34b: bhaved etasya sadṛśī sparśaneneti me matiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.35a: eṣa caiva mṛgaḥ śrīmān yaś ca divyo nabhaścaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.36a: yadi vāyaṃ tathā yan māṃ bhaved vadasi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.38b: nihatāḥ parameṣvāsās tasmād vadhyas tv ayaṃ mṛgaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.40a: sa kadācic cirāl loke āsasāda mahāmunim /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.40b: agastyaṃ tejasā yuktaṃ bhakṣyas tasya babhūva ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.41a: samutthāne ca tadrūpaṃ kartukāmaṃ samīkṣya tam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.41b: utsmayitvā tu bhagavān vātāpim idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.42b: jīvaloke dvijaśreṣṭhās tasmād asi jarāṃ gataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.43a: evaṃ tan na bhaved rakṣo vātāpir iva lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.44b: iha tvaṃ bhava saṃnaddho yantrito rakṣa maithilīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.45a: asyām āyattam asmākaṃ yat kṛtyaṃ raghunandana /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.45b: aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi grahīṣyāmy athavā mṛgam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.46a: yāvad gacchāmi saumitre mṛgam ānayituṃ drutam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.47a: tvacā pradhānayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.48a: yāvat pṛṣatam ekena sāyakena nihanmy aham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.48b: hatvaitac carma ādāya śīghram eṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.48c: pradakṣiṇenātibalena pakṣiṇā jaṭāyuṣā buddhimatā ca lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_41.48d: bhavāpramattaḥ pratigṛhya maithilīṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvata eva śaṅkitaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.1a: tathā tu taṃ samādiśya bhrātaraṃ raghunandanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.3a: taṃ vañcayāno rājendram āpatantaṃ nirīkṣya vai /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.4a: baddhāsir dhanur ādāya pradudrāva yato mṛgaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.4b: taṃ sa paśyati rūpeṇa dyotamānam ivāgrataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.7b: muhūrtād eva dadṛśe muhur dūrāt prakāśate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.8b: āsīt kruddhas tu kākutstho vivaśas tena mohitaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.10a: dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahātejās taṃ hantuṃ kṛtaniścayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.10b: saṃdhāya sudṛḍhe cāpe vikṛṣya balavad balī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.11a: tam eva mṛgam uddiśya jvalantam iva pannagam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.13b: mriyamāṇas tu mārīco jahau tāṃ kṛtrimāṃ tanum // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.14a: samprāptakālam ājñāya cakāra ca tataḥ svaram /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.14b: sadṛśaṃ rāghavasyaiva hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.15a: mṛgarūpaṃ tu tat tyaktvā rākṣasaṃ rūpam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.15b: cakre sa sumahākāyo mārīco jīvitaṃ tyajan // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.17a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau rākṣasaṃ ghoradarśanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.17b: jagāma manasā sītāṃ lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ smaran // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.18a: hā sīte lakṣmaṇety evam ākruśya tu mahāsvaram /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.18b: mamāra rākṣasaḥ so 'yaṃ śrutvā sītā kathaṃ bhavet // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.19a: lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.20a: tatra rāmaṃ bhayaṃ tīvram āviveśa viṣādajam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.20b: rākṣasaṃ mṛgarūpaṃ taṃ hatvā śrutvā ca tatsvaram // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_42.21a: nihatya pṛṣataṃ cānyaṃ māṃsam ādāya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.1a: ārtasvaraṃ tu taṃ bhartur vijñāya sadṛśaṃ vane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.1b: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā gaccha jānīhi rāghavam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.2a: na hi me jīvitaṃ sthāne hṛdayaṃ vāvatiṣṭhate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.2b: krośataḥ paramārtasya śrutaḥ śabdo mayā bhṛśam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.3a: ākrandamānaṃ tu vane bhrātaraṃ trātum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.3b: taṃ kṣipram abhidhāva tvaṃ bhrātaraṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.4a: rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannaṃ siṃhānām iva govṛṣam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.4b: na jagāma tathoktas tu bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.5a: tam uvāca tatas tatra kupitā janakātmajā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.5b: saumitre mitrarūpeṇa bhrātus tvam asi śatruvat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.6a: yas tvam asyām avasthāyāṃ bhrātaraṃ nābhipadyase /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.6b: icchasi tvaṃ vinaśyantaṃ rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇa matkṛte // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.7a: vyasanaṃ te priyaṃ manye sneho bhrātari nāsti te /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.7b: tena tiṣṭhasi viśrabdhas tam apaśyan mahādyutim // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.8a: kiṃ hi saṃśayam āpanne tasminn iha mayā bhavet /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.8b: kartavyam iha tiṣṭhantyā yat pradhānas tvam āgataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.9b: abravīl lakṣmaṇas trastāṃ sītāṃ mṛgavadhūm iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.11a: dānaveṣu ca ghoreṣu na sa vidyeta śobhane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.12a: avadhyaḥ samare rāmo naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.12b: na tvām asmin vane hātum utsahe rāghavaṃ vinā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.13a: anivāryaṃ balaṃ tasya balair balavatām api /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.13b: tribhir lokaiḥ samudyuktaiḥ seśvaraiḥ sāmarair api // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.14a: hṛdayaṃ nirvṛtaṃ te 'stu saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.14b: āgamiṣyati te bhartā śīghraṃ hatvā mṛgottamam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.15a: na sa tasya svaro vyaktaṃ na kaścid api daivataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.16b: rāmeṇa tvaṃ varārohe na tvāṃ tyaktum ihotsahe // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.17a: kṛtavairāś ca kalyāṇi vayam etair niśācaraiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.20b: ahaṃ tava priyaṃ manye tenaitāni prabhāṣase // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.21a: naitac citraṃ sapatneṣu pāpaṃ lakṣmaṇa yad bhavet /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.22a: suduṣṭas tvaṃ vane rāmam ekam eko 'nugacchasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.22b: mama hetoḥ praticchannaḥ prayukto bharatena vā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.24a: samakṣaṃ tava saumitre prāṇāṃs tyakṣye na saṃśayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.24b: rāmaṃ vinā kṣaṇam api na hi jīvāmi bhūtale // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.25a: ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ sītayā romaharṣaṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.26a: uttaraṃ notsahe vaktuṃ daivataṃ bhavatī mama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.26b: vākyam apratirūpaṃ tu na citraṃ strīṣu maithili // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.27a: svabhāvas tv eṣa nārīṇām eṣu lokeṣu dṛśyate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.28b: nyāyavādī yathā vākyam ukto 'haṃ paruṣaṃ tvayā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.29a: dhik tvām adya praṇaśya tvaṃ yan mām evaṃ viśaṅkase /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.30a: gamiṣye yatra kākutsthaḥ svasti te 'stu varānane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.31a: nimittāni hi ghorāṇi yāni prādurbhavanti me /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.31b: api tvāṃ saha rāmeṇa paśyeyaṃ punar āgataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.34a: pibāmi vā viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.34b: na tv ahaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ padāpi puruṣaṃ spṛśe // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.35b: pāṇibhyāṃ rudatī duḥkhād udaraṃ prajaghāna ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.35c: tām ārtarūpāṃ vimanā rudantīṃ saumitrir ālokya viśālanetrām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.35d: āśvāsayāmāsa na caiva bhartus taṃ bhrātaraṃ kiṃcid uvāca sītā //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.35e: tatas tu sītām abhivādya lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ kiṃcid abhipraṇamya /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_43.35f: avekṣamāṇo bahuśaś ca maithilīṃ jagāma rāmasya samīpam ātmavān //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.1a: tayā paruṣam uktas tu kupito rāghavānujaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.1b: sa vikāṅkṣan bhṛśaṃ rāmaṃ pratasthe nacirād iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.5a: tām apaśyat tato bālāṃ rājaputrīṃ yaśasvinīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.6b: samīkṣya na prakampante na pravāti ca mārutaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.7a: śīghrasrotāś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vīkṣantaṃ raktalocanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.7b: stimitaṃ gantum ārebhe bhayād godāvarī nadī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.8a: rāmasya tv antaraṃ prepsur daśagrīvas tadantare /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.10a: sa pāpo bhavyarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpa ivāvṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.14a: tām uttamāṃ trilokānāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.15b: kamalānāṃ śubhāṃ mālāṃ padminīva ca bibhratī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.16a: hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ śubhā lakṣmīr apsarā vā śubhānane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.16b: bhūtir vā tvaṃ varārohe ratir vā svairacāriṇī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.17a: samāḥ śikhariṇaḥ snigdhāḥ pāṇḍurā daśanās tava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.20b: mano harasi me rāme nadīkūlam ivāmbhasā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.21b: naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.22b: iha vāsaś ca kāntāre cittam unmādayanti me // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.23a: sā pratikrāma bhadraṃ te na tvaṃ vastum ihārhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.25a: varaṃ mālyaṃ varaṃ pānaṃ varaṃ vastraṃ ca śobhane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.25b: bhartāraṃ ca varaṃ manye tvadyuktam asitekṣaṇe // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.26a: kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā śucismite /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.26b: vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.27a: neha gacchanti gandharvā na devā na ca kiṃnarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.27b: rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāsaḥ kathaṃ nu tvam ihāgatā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.28b: ṛkṣās tarakṣavaḥ kaṅkāḥ kathaṃ tebhyo na bibhyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.29b: katham ekā mahāraṇye na bibheṣi varānane // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.30a: kāsi kasya kutaś ca tvaṃ kiṃnimittaṃ ca daṇḍakān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.31a: dvijātiveṣeṇa hi taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āgatam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.32b: abravīt siddham ity eva tadā taṃ saumyadarśanam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.32c: dvijātiveṣeṇa samīkṣya maithilī tam āgataṃ pātrakusumbhadhāriṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.32d: aśakyam udveṣṭum upāyadarśanān nyamantrayad brāhmaṇavad yathāgatam //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.32e: iyaṃ bṛsī brāhmaṇa kāmam āsyatām idaṃ ca pādyaṃ pratigṛhyatām iti /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.32f: idaṃ ca siddhaṃ vanajātam uttamaṃ tvadartham avyagram ihopabhujyatām //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.32h: prahasya tasyā haraṇe dhṛtaṃ manaḥ samarpayāmāsa vadhāya rāvaṇaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.32i: tataḥ suveṣaṃ mṛgayāgataṃ patiṃ pratīkṣamāṇā sahalakṣmaṇaṃ tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_44.32j: nirīkṣamāṇā haritaṃ dadarśa tan mahad vanaṃ naiva tu rāmalakṣmaṇau //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.1a: rāvaṇena tu vaidehī tadā pṛṣṭā jihīrṣuṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.2a: brāhmaṇaś cātithiś caiṣa anukto hi śapeta mām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.2b: iti dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu sītā vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.3b: sītā nāmnāsmi bhadraṃ te rāmabhāryā dvijottama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.5a: tataḥ saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ samamanyata me patim /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.6b: kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ mamāryā yācate varam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.6c: pratigṛhya tu kaikeyī śvaśuraṃ sukṛtena me /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.8a: nādya bhokṣye na ca svapsye na pāsye 'haṃ kadācana /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.8b: eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.9a: iti bruvāṇāṃ kaikeyīṃ śvaśuro me sa mānadaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.9b: ayācatārthair anvarthair na ca yācñāṃ cakāra sā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.10a: rāmeti prathito loke guṇavān satyavāk śuciḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.11a: abhiṣekāya tu pituḥ samīpaṃ rāmam āgatam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.11b: kaikeyī mama bhartāram ity uvāca drutaṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.12a: tava pitrā samājñaptaṃ mamedaṃ śṛṇu rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.13a: tvayā tu khalu vastavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.14a: tathety uvāca tāṃ rāmaḥ kaikeyīm akutobhayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.14b: cakāra tadvacas tasyā mama bhartā dṛḍhavrataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.15a: dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyāt satyaṃ brūyān na cānṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.15b: etad brāhmaṇa rāmasya vrataṃ dhruvam anuttamam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.16a: tasya bhrātā tu vaimātro lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.17a: sa bhrātā lakṣmaṇo nāma dharmacārī dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.18a: te vayaṃ pracyutā rājyāt kaikeyyās tu kṛte trayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.19a: samāśvasa muhūrtaṃ tu śakyaṃ vastum iha tvayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.19b: āgamiṣyati me bhartā vanyam ādāya puṣkalam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.20a: sa tvaṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca kulam ācakṣva tattvataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.20b: ekaś ca daṇḍakāraṇye kimarthaṃ carasi dvija // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.22b: ahaṃ sa rāvaṇo nāma sīte rakṣogaṇeśvaraḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.24b: sarvāsām eva bhadraṃ te mamāgramahiṣī bhava // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.25a: laṅkā nāma samudrasya madhye mama mahāpurī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.26a: tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ vaneṣu vicariṣyasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.27b: sīte paricariṣyanti bhāryā bhavasi me yadi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.32a: tvaṃ punar jambukaḥ siṃhīṃ mām ihecchasi durlabhām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.32b: nāhaṃ śakyā tvayā spraṣṭum ādityasya prabhā yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.33a: pādapān kāñcanān nūnaṃ bahūn paśyasi mandabhāk /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.33b: rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ yas tvam icchasi rāvaṇa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.35b: kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ pītvā svastimān gantum icchasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.36a: akṣisūcyā pramṛjasi jihvayā lekṣi ca kṣuram /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.36b: rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryām adhigantuṃ tvam icchasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.36c: avasajya śilāṃ kaṇṭhe samudraṃ tartum icchasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.37b: yo rāmasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pradharṣayitum icchasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.38b: kalyāṇavṛttāṃ rāmasya yo bhāryāṃ hartum icchasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.39b: rāmasya sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ yo 'dhigantuṃ tvam icchasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.39c: yad antaraṃ siṃhaśṛgālayor vane yad antaraṃ syandanikāsamudrayoḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.39d: surāgryasauvīrakayor yad antaraṃ tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.39e: yad antaraṃ kāñcanasīsalohayor yad antaraṃ candanavāripaṅkayoḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.39f: yad antaraṃ hastibiḍālayor vane tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.39g: yad antaraṃ vāyasavainateyayor yad antaraṃ madgumayūrayor api /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.39h: yad antaraṃ sārasagṛdhrayor vane tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.39j: hṛtāpi te 'haṃ na jarāṃ gamiṣye vajraṃ yathā makṣikayāvagīrṇam //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.39k: itīva tad vākyam aduṣṭabhāvā sudṛṣṭam uktvā rajanīcaraṃ tam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.39l: gātraprakampād vyathitā babhūva vātoddhatā sā kadalīva tanvī //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.39m: tāṃ vepamānām upalakṣya sītāṃ sa rāvaṇo mṛtyusamaprabhāvaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_45.39n: kulaṃ balaṃ nāma ca karma cātmanaḥ samācacakṣe bhayakāraṇārtham //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.1b: lalāṭe bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ pratyuvāca ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.2b: rāvaṇo nāma bhadraṃ te daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.3b: vidravanti bhayād bhītā mṛtyor iva sadā prajāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.4b: dvaṃdvam āsāditaḥ krodhād raṇe vikramya nirjitaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.6a: yasya tat puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ kāmagaṃ śubham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.6b: vīryād āvarjitaṃ bhadre yena yāmi vihāyasam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.8a: yatra tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ tatra māruto vāti śaṅkitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.8b: tīvrāṃśuḥ śiśirāṃśuś ca bhayāt sampadyate raviḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.9b: bhavanti yatra yatrāhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi ca carāmi ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.10a: mama pāre samudrasya laṅkā nāma purī śubhā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.13a: tatra tvaṃ vasatī sīte rājaputri mayā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.14a: bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān divyāṃś ca varavarṇini /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.15a: sthāpayitvā priyaṃ putraṃ rājñā daśarathena yaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.15b: mandavīryaḥ suto jyeṣṭhas tataḥ prasthāpito vanam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.18a: pratyākhyāya hi māṃ bhīru- paritāpaṃ gamiṣyasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.19a: evam uktā tu vaidehī kruddhā saṃraktalocanā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.20b: bhrātaraṃ vyapadiśya tvam aśubhaṃ kartum icchasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.21b: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.22a: apahṛtya śacīṃ bhāryāṃ śakyam indrasya jīvitum /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.22b: na tu rāmasya bhāryāṃ mām apanīyāsti jīvitam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.23a: jīvec ciraṃ vajradharasya hastāc chacīṃ pradhṛṣyāpratirūparūpām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_46.23b: na mādṛśīṃ rākṣasa dharṣayitvā pītāmṛtasyāpi tavāsti mokṣaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.1b: haste hastaṃ samāhatya cakāra sumahad vapuḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.2a: sa maithilīṃ punar vākyaṃ babhāṣe ca tato bhṛśam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.3a: udvaheyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ tu medinīm ambare sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.3b: āpibeyaṃ samudraṃ ca mṛtyuṃ hanyāṃ raṇe sthitaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.4a: arkaṃ rundhyāṃ śarais tīkṣṇair vibhindyāṃ hi mahītalam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.4b: kāmarūpiṇam unmatte paśya māṃ kāmadaṃ patim // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.6a: sadyaḥ saumyaṃ parityajya bhikṣurūpaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.10a: sa tām asitakeśāntāṃ bhāskarasya prabhām iva /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.11a: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ yadi bhartāram icchasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.11b: mām āśraya varārohe tavāhaṃ sadṛśaḥ patiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.11c: māṃ bhajasva cirāya tvam ahaṃ ślāghyas tava priyaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.12a: naiva cāhaṃ kvacid bhadre kariṣye tava vipriyam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.12b: tyajyatāṃ mānuṣo bhāvo mayi bhāvaḥ praṇīyatām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.14a: yaḥ striyā vacanād rājyaṃ vihāya sasuhṛjjanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.15a: ity uktvā maithilīṃ vākyaṃ priyārhāṃ priyavādinīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.15b: jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ budhaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.16a: vāmena sītāṃ padmākṣīṃ mūrdhajeṣu kareṇa saḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.18a: sa ca māyāmayo divyaḥ kharayuktaḥ kharasvanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.19a: tatas tāṃ paruṣair vākyair abhitarjya mahāsvanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.20b: rāmeti sītā duḥkhārtā rāmaṃ dūragataṃ vane // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.21a: tām akāmāṃ sa kāmārtaḥ pannagendravadhūm iva /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.24a: jīvitaṃ sukham arthāṃś ca dharmahetoḥ parityajan /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.24b: hriyamāṇām adharmeṇa māṃ rāghava na paśyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.25b: katham evaṃvidhaṃ pāpaṃ na tvaṃ śādhi hi rāvaṇam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.26b: kālo 'py aṅgī bhavaty atra sasyānām iva paktaye // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.28a: hantedānīṃ sakāmā tu kaikeyī bāndhavaiḥ saha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.29b: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.30b: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.31b: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.32a: daivatāni ca yānty asmin vane vividhapādape /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.32b: namaskaromy ahaṃ tebhyo bhartuḥ śaṃsata māṃ hṛtām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.33a: yāni kānicid apy atra sattvāni nivasanty uta /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.36a: rāmāya tu yathātattvaṃ jaṭāyo haraṇaṃ mama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_47.36b: lakṣmaṇāya ca tat sarvam ākhyātavyam aśeṣataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.1a: taṃ śabdam avasuptasya jaṭāyur atha śuśruve /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.1b: niraikṣad rāvaṇaṃ kṣipraṃ vaidehīṃ ca dadarśa saḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.4b: lokānāṃ ca hite yukto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.5b: sītā nāma varārohā yāṃ tvaṃ hartum ihecchasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.5c: kathaṃ rājā sthito dharme paradārān parāmṛśet /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.7a: na tat samācared dhīro yat paro 'sya vigarhayet /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.8a: arthaṃ vā yadi vā kāmaṃ śiṣṭāḥ śāstreṣvanāgatam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.9a: rājā dharmaś ca kāmaś ca dravyāṇāṃ cottamo nidhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.9b: dharmaḥ śubhaṃ vā pāpaṃ vā rājamūlaṃ pravartate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.10a: pāpasvabhāvaś capalaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.11a: kāmasvabhāvo yo yasya na sa śakyaḥ pramārjitum /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.11b: na hi duṣṭātmanām āryam āvasaty ālaye ciram // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.12a: viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā rāmo mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.14a: atra brūhi yathāsatyaṃ ko rāmasya vyatikramaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.14b: yasya tvaṃ lokanāthasya hṛtvā bhāryāṃ gamiṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.15a: kṣipraṃ visṛja vaidehīṃ mā tvā ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.16b: grīvāyāṃ pratimuktaṃ ca kālapāśaṃ na paśyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.17a: sa bhāraḥ saumya bhartavyo yo naraṃ nāvasādayet /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.17b: tad annam upabhoktavyaṃ jīryate yad anāmayam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.18a: yat kṛtvā na bhaved dharmo na kīrtir na yaśo bhuvi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.18b: śarīrasya bhavet khedaḥ kas tat karma samācaret // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.20a: vṛddho 'haṃ tvaṃ yuvā dhanvī sarathaḥ kavacī śarī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.20b: tathāpy ādāya vaidehīṃ kuśalī na gamiṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.21a: na śaktas tvaṃ balāddhartuṃ vaidehīṃ mama paśyataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.22a: yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.22b: śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathāpūrvaṃ kharas tathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.23b: nacirāc cīravāsās tvāṃ rāmo yudhi vadhiṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.24a: kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ gatau dūraṃ nṛpātmajau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.24b: kṣipraṃ tvaṃ naśyase nīca tayor bhīto na saṃśayaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.25a: na hi me jīvamānasya nayiṣyasi śubhām imām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.26a: avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaṃ priyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.26c: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha daśagrīva muhūrtaṃ paśya rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_48.27b: vṛntād iva phalaṃ tvāṃ tu pātayeyaṃ rathottamāt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.3a: sa samprahāras tumulas tayos tasmin mahāvane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.9a: sa tair bāṇair mahāvīryaḥ pūrṇamuktair ajihmagaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.9b: bibheda niśitais tīkṣṇair gṛdhraṃ ghoraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.13b: tāṃś cāsya javasampannāñ jaghāna samare balī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.16b: sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni gṛdhrarājam apūjayan // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.17a: pariśrāntaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā jarayā pakṣiyūthapam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.17b: utpapāta punar hṛṣṭo maithilīṃ gṛhya rāvaṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.19b: alpabuddhe harasy enāṃ vadhāya khalu rakṣasām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.21b: śīghram eva vinaśyanti yathā tvaṃ vinaśiṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.22a: baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena kva gatas tasya mokṣyase /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.22b: vadhāya baḍiśaṃ gṛhya sāmiṣaṃ jalajo yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.23a: na hi jātu durādharṣau kākutsthau tava rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.24a: yathā tvayā kṛtaṃ karma bhīruṇā lokagarhitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.25a: yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.25b: śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathā bhrātā kharas tathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.27a: pāpānubandho vai yasya karmaṇaḥ ko nu tat pumān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.28a: evam uktvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ jaṭāyus tasya rakṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.29a: taṃ gṛhītvā nakhais tīkṣṇair virarāda samantataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.30a: virarāda nakhair asya tuṇḍaṃ pṛṣṭhe samarpayan /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.31a: sa tathā gṛdhrarājena kliśyamāno muhur muhuḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.34a: tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ sītām utsṛjya vīryavān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.35b: rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pakṣiṇāṃ pravarasya ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.36b: pakṣau pādau ca pārśvau ca khaḍgam uddhṛtya socchinat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.38a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.38d: dadarśa laṅkādhipatiḥ pṛthivyāṃ jaṭāyuṣaṃ śāntam ivāgnidāvam //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.38e: tatas tu taṃ pattrarathaṃ mahītale nipātitaṃ rāvaṇavegamarditam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_49.38f: punaḥ pariṣvajya śaśiprabhānanā ruroda sītā janakātmajā tadā //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.2a: sā tu tārādhipamukhī rāvaṇena samīkṣya tam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.4a: na nūnaṃ rāma jānāsi mahad vyasanam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.5a: trāhi mām adya kākutstha lakṣmaṇeti varāṅganā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.7a: tāṃ latām iva veṣṭantīm āliṅgantīṃ mahādrumān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.8a: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti rāmeṇa rahitāṃ vane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.10a: dṛṣṭvā sītāṃ parāmṛṣṭāṃ dīnāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.10b: kṛtaṃ kāryam iti śrīmān vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.11a: prahṛṣṭā vyathitāś cāsan sarve te paramarṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.12a: sa tu tāṃ rāma rāmeti rudantīṃ lakṣmaṇeti ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.13b: rarāja rājaputrī tu vidyut saudāmanī yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.14a: uddhūtena ca vastreṇa tasyāḥ pītena rāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.17a: tasyās tad vimalaṃ vaktram ākāśe rāvaṇāṅkagam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.17b: na rarāja vinā rāmaṃ vinālam iva paṅkajam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.17c: babhūva jaladaṃ nīlaṃ bhittvā candra ivoditaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.20b: śuśubhe na vinā rāmaṃ divā candra ivoditaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.21b: śuśubhe kāñcanī kāñcī nīlaṃ maṇim ivāśritā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.23b: babhūva vimalo nīlaḥ saghoṣa iva toyadaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.31b: vaidehyā nipatan bhāti gaṅgeva gaganāc cyutā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.32b: mā bhair iti vidhūtāgrā vyājahrur iva pādapāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.33b: sakhīm iva gatotsāhāṃ śocantīva sma maithilīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.36a: hriyamāṇāṃ tu vaidehīṃ dṛṣṭvā dīno divākaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.37a: nāsti dharmaḥ kutaḥ satyaṃ nārjavaṃ nānṛśaṃsatā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.37b: yatra rāmasya vaidehīṃ bhāryāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.40a: vikrośantīṃ dṛḍhaṃ sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ tathā gatām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.40b: tāṃ tu lakṣmaṇa rāmeti krośantīṃ madhurasvarām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_50.41c: tatas tu sā cārudatī śucismitā vinākṛtā bandhujanena maithilī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.1a: kham utpatantaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā maithilī janakātmajā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.3b: jñātvā virahitāṃ yo māṃ corayitvā palāyase // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.3c: tvayaiva nūnaṃ duṣṭātman bhīruṇā hartum icchatā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.4b: yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'py ayaṃ vinipātitaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.5a: paramaṃ khalu te vīryaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasādhama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.5b: viśrāvya nāmadheyaṃ hi yuddhe nāsti jitā tvayā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.6a: īdṛśaṃ garhitaṃ karma kathaṃ kṛtvā na lajjase /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.6b: striyāś ca haraṇaṃ nīca rahite ca parasya ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.8a: dhik te śauryaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca yat tvayā kathitaṃ tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.8b: kulākrośakaraṃ loke dhik te cāritram īdṛśam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.9a: kiṃ śakyaṃ kartum evaṃ hi yaj javenaiva dhāvasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.9b: muhūrtam api tiṣṭhasva na jīvan pratiyāsyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.10a: na hi cakṣuḥpathaṃ prāpya tayoḥ pārthivaputrayoḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.10b: sasainyo 'pi samarthas tvaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.11a: na tvaṃ tayoḥ śarasparśaṃ soḍhuṃ śaktaḥ kathaṃcana /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.11c: sādhu kṛtvātmanaḥ pathyaṃ sādhu māṃ muñca rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.12a: matpradharṣaṇaruṣṭo hi bhrātrā saha patir mama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.12b: vidhāsyati vināśāya tvaṃ māṃ yadi na muñcasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.13a: yena tvaṃ vyavasāyena balān māṃ hartum icchasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.13b: vyavasāyaḥ sa te nīca bhaviṣyati nirarthakaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.14a: na hy ahaṃ tam apaśyantī bhartāraṃ vibudhopamam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.15a: na nūnaṃ cātmanaḥ śreyaḥ pathyaṃ vā samavekṣase /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.16a: mumūrṣūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ yat pathyaṃ tan na rocate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.17a: yathā cāsmin bhayasthāne na bibheṣi daśānana /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.17b: vyaktaṃ hiraṇmayān hi tvaṃ saṃpaśyasi mahīruhān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.19b: drakṣyase śālmalīṃ tīkṣṇām āyasaiḥ kaṇṭakaiś citām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.20a: na hi tvam īdṛśaṃ kṛtvā tasyālīkaṃ mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.20b: dharituṃ śakṣyasi ciraṃ viṣaṃ pītveva nirghṛṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.21b: kva gato lapsyase śarma bhartur mama mahātmanaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.23a: sa kathaṃ rāghavo vīraḥ sarvāstrakuśalo balī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.23b: na tvāṃ hanyāc charais tīkṣṇair iṣṭabhāryāpahāriṇam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.24a: etac cānyac ca paruṣaṃ vaidehī rāvaṇāṅkagā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.24c: tathā bhṛśārtāṃ bahu caiva bhāṣiṇīṃ vilalāpa pūrvaṃ karuṇaṃ ca bhāminīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_51.24d: jahāra pāpas taruṇīṃ viveṣṭatīṃ nṛpātmajām āgatagātravepathum //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.1a: hriyamāṇā tu vaidehī kaṃcin nātham apaśyatī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.2b: mumoca yadi rāmāya śaṃseyur iti maithilī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.3b: sambhramāt tu daśagrīvas tat karma na ca buddhavān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.4a: piṅgākṣās tāṃ viśālākṣīṃ netrair animiṣair iva /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.5a: sa ca pampām atikramya laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.6a: tāṃ jahāra susaṃhṛṣṭo rāvaṇo mṛtyum ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.7a: vanāni saritaḥ śailān sarāṃsi ca vihāyasā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.7b: sa kṣipraṃ samatīyāya śaraś cāpād iva cyutaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.11a: sa tu sītāṃ viveṣṭantīm aṅkenādāya rāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.11b: praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ rūpiṇīṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.13b: nidadhe rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ mayo māyām ivāsurīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.14b: yathā naināṃ pumān strī vā sītāṃ paśyaty asaṃmataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.15b: yad yad icchet tad evāsyā deyaṃ macchandato yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.16a: yā ca vakṣyati vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ kiṃcid apriyam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.16b: ajñānād yadi vā jñānān na tasyā jīvitaṃ priyam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.16c: tathoktvā rākṣasīs tās tu rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.17a: niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt kiṃ kṛtyam iti cintayan /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.18a: sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahāvīryo varadānena mohitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.20b: pauruṣaṃ balam āśritya trāsam utsṛjya dūrataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.21a: balaṃ hi sumahad yan me janasthāne niveśitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.22b: vairaṃ ca sumahajjātaṃ rāmaṃ prati sudāruṇam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.23a: niryātayitum icchāmi tac ca vairam ahaṃ ripoḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.23b: na hi lapsyāmy ahaṃ nidrām ahatvā saṃyuge ripum // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.24a: taṃ tv idānīm ahaṃ hatvā kharadūṣaṇaghātinam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.25a: janasthāne vasadbhis tu bhavadbhī rāmam āśritā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.26a: apramādāc ca gantavyaṃ sarvair eva niśācaraiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.26b: kartavyaś ca sadā yatno rāghavasya vadhaṃ prati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.27b: ataś cāsmiñ janasthāne mayā yūyaṃ niyojitāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.27c: tataḥ priyaṃ vākyam upetya rākṣasā mahārtham aṣṭāv abhivādya rāvaṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.27d: vihāya laṅkāṃ sahitāḥ pratasthire yato janasthānam alakṣyadarśanāḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.27e: tatas tu sītām upalabhya rāvaṇaḥ susamprahṛṣṭaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_52.27f: prasajya rāmeṇa ca vairam uttamaṃ babhūva mohān muditaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.2b: praviveśa gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ sītāṃ draṣṭum abhitvaran // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.3a: sa praviśya tu tadveśma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.6a: tāṃ tu śokavaśāṃ dīnām avaśāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.8a: kāñcanais tāpanīyaiś ca sphāṭikai rājatais tathā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.9b: sopānaṃ kāñcanaṃ citram āruroha tayā saha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.13a: darśayitvā tu vaidehīṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad bhavanottamam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.15a: teṣāṃ prabhur ahaṃ sīte sarveṣāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.16a: yad idaṃ rājyatantraṃ me tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.16b: jīvitaṃ ca viśālākṣi tvaṃ me prāṇair garīyasī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.17b: tāsāṃ tvam īśvarī sīte mama bhāryā bhava priye // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.18a: sādhu kiṃ te 'nyayā buddhyā rocayasva vaco mama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.19b: neyaṃ dharṣayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.20a: na deveṣu na yakṣeṣu na gandharveṣu narṣiṣu /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.20b: ahaṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu yo me vīryasamo bhavet // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.22a: bhajasva sīte mām eva bhartāhaṃ sadṛśas tava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.22b: yauvanaṃ hy adhruvaṃ bhīru ramasveha mayā saha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.23a: darśane mā kṛthā buddhiṃ rāghavasya varānane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.23b: kāsya śaktir ihāgantum api sīte manorathaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.24a: na śakyo vāyur ākāśe pāśair baddhaṃ mahājavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.24b: dīpyamānasya vāpy agner grahītuṃ vimalāṃ śikhām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.25a: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ na taṃ paśyāmi śobhane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.26a: laṅkāyāṃ sumahad rājyam idaṃ tvam anupālaya /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.27a: duṣkṛtaṃ yat purā karma vanavāsena tad gatam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.27b: yaś ca te sukṛto dharmas tasyeha phalam āpnuhi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.28b: bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni tāni seva mayā saha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.29a: puṣpakaṃ nāma suśroṇi bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya me /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.29b: vimānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca tad vimānaṃ manojavam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.30a: tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ viharasva yathāsukham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.31a: śokārtaṃ tu varārohe na bhrājati varānane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.32b: etau pādau mayā snigdhau śirobhiḥ paripīḍitau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.33a: prasādaṃ kuru me kṣipraṃ vaśyo dāso 'ham asmi te /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.33b: nemāḥ śūnyā mayā vācaḥ śuṣyamāṇena bhāṣitāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_53.34a: na cāpi rāvaṇaḥ kāṃcin mūrdhnā strīṃ praṇameta ha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.1a: sā tathoktā tu vaidehī nirbhayā śokakarṣitā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.2b: satyasaṃdhaḥ parijñāto yasya putraḥ sa rāghavaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.3a: rāmo nāma sa dharmātmā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.3b: dīrghabāhur viśālākṣo daivataṃ sa patir mama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.4b: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā yas te prāṇān hariṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.5a: pratyakṣaṃ yady ahaṃ tasya tvayā syāṃ dharṣitā balāt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.5b: śayitā tvaṃ hataḥ saṃkhye janasthāne yathā kharaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.6a: ya ete rākṣasāḥ proktā ghorarūpā mahābalāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.6b: rāghave nirviṣāḥ sarve suparṇe pannagā yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.8a: asurair vā surair vā tvaṃ yady avadho 'si rāvaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.8b: utpādya sumahad vairaṃ jīvaṃs tasya na mokṣyase // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.10a: yadi paśyet sa rāmas tvāṃ roṣadīptena cakṣuṣā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.10b: rakṣas tvam adya nirdagdho gaccheḥ sadyaḥ parābhavam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.11a: yaś candraṃ nabhaso bhūmau pātayen nāśayeta vā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.11b: sāgaraṃ śoṣayed vāpi sa sītāṃ mocayed iha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.13a: na te pāpam idaṃ karma sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.13b: yāhaṃ nītā vinā bhāvaṃ patipārśvāt tvayā vanāt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.14a: sa hi daivatasaṃyukto mama bhartā mahādyutiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.14b: nirbhayo vīryam āśritya śūnye vasati daṇḍake // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.15a: sa te darpaṃ balaṃ vīryam utsekaṃ ca tathāvidham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.16b: tadā kārye pramādyanti narāḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.17a: māṃ pradhṛṣya sa te kālaḥ prāpto 'yaṃ rākṣasādhama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.18c: idaṃ śarīraṃ niḥsaṃjñaṃ bandha vā ghātayasva vā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.19a: nedaṃ śarīraṃ rakṣyaṃ me jīvitaṃ vāpi rākṣasa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.19b: na hi śakṣyāmy upakrośaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dātum ātmanaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.20a: evam uktvā tu vaidehī krodhāt suparuṣaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.20b: rāvaṇaṃ maithilī tatra punar novāca kiṃcana // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.21c: śṛṇu maithili madvākyaṃ māsān dvādaśa bhāmini /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.22b: tatas tvāṃ prātarāśārthaṃ sūdāś chetsyanti leśaśaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.23a: ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.23b: rākṣasīś ca tataḥ kruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.24a: śīghram evaṃ hi rākṣasyo vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.25a: vacanād eva tās tasya vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.26a: sa tāḥ provāca rājā tu rāvaṇo ghoradarśanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.28a: tatraināṃ tarjanair ghoraiḥ punaḥ sāntvaiś ca maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.28b: ānayadhvaṃ vaśaṃ sarvā vanyāṃ gajavadhūm iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.31c: na vindate tatra tu śarma maithilī virūpanetrābhir atīva tarjitā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_54.31d: patiṃ smarantī dayitaṃ ca devaraṃ vicetanābhūd bhayaśokapīḍitā //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.1b: nihatya rāmo mārīcaṃ tūrṇaṃ pathi nyavartata // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.3a: sa tasya svaram ājñāya dāruṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.4a: aśubhaṃ bata manye 'haṃ gomāyur vāśyate yathā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.4b: svasti syād api vaidehyā rākṣasair bhakṣaṇaṃ vinā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.5a: mārīcena tu vijñāya svaram ālakṣya māmakam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.6a: sa saumitriḥ svaraṃ śrutvā tāṃ ca hitvātha maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.7a: rākṣasaiḥ sahitair nūnaṃ sītāyā īpsito vadhaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.7b: kāñcanaś ca mṛgo bhūtvā vyapanīyāśramāt tu mām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.8a: dūraṃ nītvā tu mārīco rākṣaso 'bhūc charāhataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.8b: hā lakṣmaṇa hato 'smīti yad vākyaṃ vyājahāra ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.8c: api svasti bhaved dvābhyāṃ rahitābhyāṃ mayā vane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.9b: nimittāni ca ghorāṇi dṛśyante 'dya bahūni ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.9c: ity evaṃ cintayan rāmaḥ śrutvā gomāyuniḥsvanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.11b: savyaṃ kṛtvā mahātmānaṃ ghorāṃś ca sasṛjuḥ svarān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.14a: saṃjagarhe 'tha taṃ bhrātā jyeṣṭho lakṣmaṇam āgatam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.15a: gṛhītvā ca karaṃ savyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ raghunandanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.16a: aho lakṣmaṇa garhyaṃ te kṛtaṃ yat tvaṃ vihāya tām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.16b: sītām ihāgataḥ saumya kaccit svasti bhaved iti // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.17a: na me 'sti saṃśayo vīra sarvathā janakātmajā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.18a: aśubhāny eva bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yathā prādurbhavanti me /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.18c: idaṃ hi rakṣo mṛgasaṃnikāśaṃ pralobhya māṃ dūram anuprayātam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.18d: hataṃ kathaṃcin mahatā śrameṇa sa rākṣaso 'bhūn mriyamāṇa eva //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.20a: manaś ca me dīnam ihāprahṛṣṭaṃ cakṣuś ca savyaṃ kurute vikāram /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_55.20b: asaṃśayaṃ lakṣmaṇa nāsti sītā hṛtā mṛtā vā pathi vartate vā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.1a: sa dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnaṃ śūnye daśarathātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.2a: prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ yā mām anujagāma ha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.2b: kva sā lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yāṃ hitvā tvam ihāgataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.3b: kva sā duḥkhasahāyā me vaidehī tanumadhyamā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.4a: yāṃ vinā notsahe vīra muhūrtam api jīvitum /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.4b: kva sā prāṇasahāyā me sītā surasutopamā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.5a: patitvam amarāṇāṃ vā pṛthivyāś cāpi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.6a: kaccij jīvati vaidehī prāṇaiḥ priyatarā mama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.6b: kaccit pravrājanaṃ saumya na me mithyā bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.7a: sītānimittaṃ saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.7b: kaccit sakāmā sukhitā kaikeyī sā bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.8b: upasthāsyati kausalyā kaccit saumya na kaikayīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.9a: yadi jīvati vaidehī gamiṣyāmy āśramaṃ punaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.9b: suvṛttā yadi vṛttā sā prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.11a: brūhi lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.11b: tvayi pramatte rakṣobhir bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.12a: sukumārī ca bālā ca nityaṃ cāduḥkhadarśinī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.13b: vadatā lakṣmaṇety uccais tavāpi janitaṃ bhayam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.14a: śrutaś ca śaṅke vaidehyā sa svaraḥ sadṛśo mama /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.14b: trastayā preṣitas tvaṃ ca draṣṭuṃ māṃ śīghram āgataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.15a: sarvathā tu kṛtaṃ kaṣṭaṃ sītām utsṛjatā vane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.16b: taiḥ sītā nihatā ghorair bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.17b: kiṃ tv idānīṃ kariṣyāmi śaṅke prāptavyam īdṛśam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.18a: iti sītāṃ varārohāṃ cintayann eva rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.18c: vigarhamāṇo 'nujam ārtarūpaṃ kṣudhā śramāc caiva pipāsayā ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.18d: viniḥśvasañ śuṣkamukho viṣaṇṇaḥ pratiśrayaṃ prāpya samīkṣya śūnyam //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.20a: svam āśramaṃ saṃpravigāhya vīro vihāradeśān anusṛtya kāṃścit /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_56.20b: etat tad ity eva nivāsabhūmau prahṛṣṭaromā vyathito babhūva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.2a: tam uvāca kimarthaṃ tvam āgato 'pāsya maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.2b: yadā sā tava viśvāsād vane virahitā mayā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.3a: dṛṣṭvaivābhyāgataṃ tvāṃ me maithilīṃ tyajya lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.3b: śaṅkamānaṃ mahat pāpaṃ yat satyaṃ vyathitaṃ manaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.4a: sphurate nayanaṃ savyaṃ bāhuś ca hṛdayaṃ ca me /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.4b: dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa dūre tvāṃ sītāvirahitaṃ pathi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.5a: evam uktas tu saumitrir lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.6a: na svayaṃ kāmakāreṇa tāṃ tyaktvāham ihāgataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.7a: āryeṇeva parikruṣṭaṃ hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.7b: paritrāhīti yad vākyaṃ maithilyās tac chrutiṃ gatam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.8a: sā tam ārtasvaraṃ śrutvā tava snehena maithilī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.8b: gaccha gaccheti mām āha rudantī bhayavihvalā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.10a: na tat paśyāmy ahaṃ rakṣo yad asya bhayam āvahet /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.10b: nirvṛtā bhava nāsty etat kenāpy evam udāhṛtam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.11a: vigarhitaṃ ca nīcaṃ ca katham āryo 'bhidhāsyati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.11b: trāhīti vacanaṃ sīte yas trāyet tridaśān api // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.11c: kiṃnimittaṃ tu kenāpi bhrātur ālambya me svaram /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.12a: visvaraṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇa trāhi mām iti /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.12c: alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya svasthā bhava nirutsukā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.13a: na cāsti triṣu lokeṣu pumān yo rāghavaṃ raṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.13b: jāto vā jāyamāno vā saṃyuge yaḥ parājayet // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.14b: uvācāśrūṇi muñcantī dāruṇaṃ mām idaṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.15a: bhāvo mayi tavātyarthaṃ pāpa eva niveśitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.15b: vinaṣṭe bhrātari prāpte na ca tvaṃ mām avāpsyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.18a: evam ukto hi vaidehyā saṃrabdho raktalocanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.19b: abravīd duṣkṛtaṃ saumya tāṃ vinā yat tvam āgataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.20a: jānann api samarthaṃ māṃ rakṣasāṃ vinivāraṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.21a: na hi te parituṣyāmi tyaktvā yad yāsi maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.21b: kruddhāyāḥ paruṣaṃ śrutvā striyā yat tvam ihāgataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.22a: sarvathā tv apanītaṃ te sītayā yat pracoditaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.22b: krodhasya vaśam āgamya nākaroḥ śāsanaṃ mama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.23a: asau hi rākṣasaḥ śete śareṇābhihato mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.23c: vikṛṣya cāpaṃ paridhāya sāyakaṃ salīlabāṇena ca tāḍito mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.23d: mārgīṃ tanuṃ tyajya ca viklavasvaro babhūva keyūradharaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.23e: śarāhatenaiva tadārtayā girā svaraṃ mamālambya sudūrasaṃśravam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_57.23f: udāhṛtaṃ tad vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ tvam āgato yena vihāya maithilīm //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.1b: prāsphurac cāskhalad rāmo vepathuś cāsya jāyate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.2b: api kṣemaṃ tu sītāyā iti vai vyājahāra ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.5a: dadarśa parṇaśālāṃ ca rahitāṃ sītayā tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.5b: śriyā virahitāṃ dhvastāṃ hemante padminīm iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.8a: hṛtā mṛtā vā naṣṭā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.8b: nilīnāpy atha vā bhīrur atha vā vanam āśritā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.9a: gatā vicetuṃ puṣpāṇi phalāny api ca vā punaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.9b: atha vā padminīṃ yātā jalārthaṃ vā nadīṃ gatā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.10a: yatnān mṛgayamāṇas tu nāsasāda vane priyām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.11a: vṛkṣād vṛkṣaṃ pradhāvan sa girīṃś cāpi nadīn nadīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.12a: asti kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā sā kadambapriyā priyā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.12b: kadamba yadi jānīṣe śaṃsa sītāṃ śubhānanām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.13b: śaṃsasva yadi vā dṛṣṭā bilva bilvopamastanī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.14a: atha vārjuna śaṃsa tvaṃ priyāṃ tām arjunapriyām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.14b: janakasya sutā bhīrur yadi jīvati vā na vā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.15a: kakubhaḥ kakubhoruṃ tāṃ vyaktaṃ jānāti maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.16a: bhramarair upagītaś ca yathā drumavaro hy ayam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.18b: kathayasva varārohāṃ kāruṇyaṃ yadi te mayi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.19a: yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā sītā jambu jāmbūnadaprabhā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.19b: priyāṃ yadi vijānīṣe niḥśaṅkaṃ kathayasva me // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.20a: atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ mṛga jānāsi maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.21a: gaja sā gajanāsorur yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā bhavet /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.21b: tāṃ manye viditāṃ tubhyam ākhyāhi varavāraṇa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.22a: śārdūla yadi sā dṛṣṭā priyā candranibhānanā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.22b: maithilī mama viśrabdhaḥ kathayasva na te bhayam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.23a: kiṃ dhāvasi priye nūnaṃ dṛṣṭāsi kamalekṣaṇe /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.23b: vṛkṣeṇācchādya cātmānaṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.24a: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha varārohe na te 'sti karuṇā mayi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.25b: dhāvanty api mayā dṛṣṭā tiṣṭha yady asti sauhṛdam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.26a: naiva sā nūnam atha vā hiṃsitā cāruhāsinī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.26b: kṛcchraṃ prāptaṃ hi māṃ nūnaṃ yathopekṣitum arhati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.27a: vyaktaṃ sā bhakṣitā bālā rākṣasaiḥ piśitāśanaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.28a: nūnaṃ tac chubhadantauṣṭhaṃ mukhaṃ niṣprabhatāṃ gatam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.29a: komalā vilapantyās tu kāntāyā bhakṣitā śubhā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.30b: mayā virahitā bālā rakṣasāṃ bhakṣaṇāya vai // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.31b: hā lakṣmaṇa mahābāho paśyasi tvaṃ priyāṃ kvacit // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.32a: hā priye kva gatā bhadre hā sīteti punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.32b: ity evaṃ vilapan rāmaḥ paridhāvan vanād vanam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.33a: kvacid udbhramate vegāt kvacid vibhramate balāt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.34a: sa vanāni nadīḥ śailān giriprasravaṇāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.34c: tathā sa gatvā vipulaṃ mahad vanaṃ parītya sarvaṃ tv atha maithilīṃ prati
GE09ram_03pu:ram_58.34d: aniṣṭhitāśaḥ sa cakāra mārgaṇe punaḥ priyāyāḥ paramaṃ pariśramam //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.1b: rahitāṃ parṇaśālāṃ ca vidhvastāny āsanāni ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.2a: adṛṣṭvā tatra vaidehīṃ saṃnirīkṣya ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.2b: uvāca rāmaḥ prākruśya pragṛhya rucirau bhujau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.3a: kva nu lakṣmaṇa vaidehī kaṃ vā deśam ito gatā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.3b: kenāhṛtā vā saumitre bhakṣitā kena vā priyā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.4a: vṛkṣeṇācchādya yadi māṃ sīte hasitum icchasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.4b: alaṃ te hasitenādya māṃ bhajasva suduḥkhitam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.5a: yaiḥ saha krīḍase sīte viśvastair mṛgapotakaiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.5b: ete hīnās tvayā saumye dhyāyanty asrāvilekṣaṇāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.6b: paraloke mahārājo nūnaṃ drakṣyati me pitā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.7a: kathaṃ pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya mayā tvam abhiyojitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.8a: kāmavṛttam anāryaṃ māṃ mṛṣāvādinam eva ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.8b: dhik tvām iti pare loke vyaktaṃ vakṣyati me pitā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.9b: mām ihotsṛjya karuṇaṃ kīrtir naram ivānṛjum // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.10a: kva gacchasi varārohe mām utsṛjya sumadhyame /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.10b: tvayā virahitaś cāhaṃ mokṣye jīvitam ātmanaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.12a: paṅkam āsādya vipulaṃ sīdantam iva kuñjaram /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.13a: mā viṣādaṃ mahābāho kuru yatnaṃ mayā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.13b: idaṃ ca hi vanaṃ śūra bahukandaraśobhitam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.14b: sā vanaṃ vā praviṣṭā syān nalinīṃ vā supuṣpitām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.15a: vitrāsayitukāmā vā līnā syāt kānane kvacit /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.15b: jijñāsamānā vaidehī tvāṃ māṃ ca puruṣarṣabha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.15c: tasyā hy anveṣaṇe śrīman kṣipram eva yatāvahe /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.16a: vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicinuvo yatra sā janakātmajā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.16b: manyase yadi kākutstha mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.16c: evam uktas tu sauhārdāl lakṣmaṇena samāhitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.17b: tau vanāni girīṃś caiva saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.18b: tasya śailasya sānūni guhāś ca śikharāṇi ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.19b: vicitya sarvataḥ śailaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.20a: neha paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīṃ parvate śubhe /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.22a: yathā viṣṇur mahābāhur baliṃ baddhvā mahīm imām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.22b: evam uktas tu vīreṇa lakṣmaṇena sa rāghavaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.24b: na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.27a: bahuśaḥ sa tu niḥśvasya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.29b: apaśyaṃs tāṃ priyāṃ sītāṃ prākrośat sa punaḥ punaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_59.29c: sa dīno dīnayā vācā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.1a: śīghraṃ lakṣmaṇa jānīhi gatvā godāvarīṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.1b: api godāvarīṃ sītā padmāny ānayituṃ gatā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.2a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ punar eva hi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.3a: tāṃ lakṣmaṇas tīrthavatīṃ vicitvā rāmam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.3b: naināṃ paśyāmi tīrtheṣu krośato na śṛṇoti me // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.4a: kaṃ nu sā deśam āpannā vaidehī kleśanāśinī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.4b: na hi taṃ vedmi vai rāma yatra sā tanumadhyamā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.6: sa tām upasthito rāmaḥ kva sītety evam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.7b: na tāṃ śaśaṃsū rāmāya tathā godāvarī nadī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.8a: tataḥ pracoditā bhūtaiḥ śaṃsāsmai tāṃ priyām iti /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.8b: na ca sābhyavadat sītāṃ pṛṣṭā rāmeṇa śocitā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.9a: rāvaṇasya ca tad rūpaṃ karmāṇi ca durātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.9b: dhyātvā bhayāt tu vaidehīṃ sā nadī na śaśaṃsa tām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.10a: nirāśas tu tayā nadyā sītāyā darśane kṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.11a: kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇa vakṣyāmi sametya janakaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.11b: mātaraṃ caiva vaidehyā vinā tām aham apriyam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.12a: yā me rājyavihīnasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.12b: sarvaṃ vyapanayacchokam vaidehī kva nu sā gatā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.13b: manye dīrghā bhaviṣyanti rātrayo mama jāgrataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.14b: sarvāṇy anucariṣyāmi yadi sītā hi dṛśyate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.15a: evaṃ sambhāṣamāṇau tāv anyonyaṃ bhrātarāv ubhau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.16a: tāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahītale /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.16b: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vīro duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.18b: kruddho 'bravīd giriṃ tatra siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.19a: tāṃ hemavarṇāṃ hemābhāṃ sītāṃ darśaya parvata /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.19b: yāvat sānūni sarvāṇi na te vidhvaṃsayāmy aham // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.21a: imāṃ vā saritaṃ cādya śoṣayiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.21b: yadi nākhyāti me sītām adya candranibhānanām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.22a: evaṃ sa ruṣito rāmo didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.22b: dadarśa bhūmau niṣkrāntaṃ rākṣasasya padaṃ mahat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.23a: sa samīkṣya parikrāntaṃ sītāyā rākṣasasya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.24b: bhūṣaṇānāṃ hi saumitre mālyāni vividhāni ca // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.26b: bhittvā bhittvā vibhaktā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.27b: babhūva yuddhaṃ saumitre ghoraṃ rākṣasayor iha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.28b: dharaṇyāṃ patitaṃ saumya kasya bhagnaṃ mahad dhanuḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.29b: viśīrṇaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau kavacaṃ kasya kāñcanam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.30b: bhagnadaṇḍam idaṃ kasya bhūmau saumya nipātitam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.31b: bhīmarūpā mahākāyāḥ kasya vā nihatā raṇe // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.32b: apaviddhaś ca bhagnaś ca kasya sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.35a: hṛtā mṛtā vā sītā hi bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.35b: na dharmas trāyate sītāṃ hriyamāṇāṃ mahāvane // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.36a: bhakṣitāyāṃ hi vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.36b: ke hi loke priyaṃ kartuṃ śaktāḥ saumya mameśvarāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.38b: nirvīrya iti manyante nūnaṃ māṃ tridaśeśvarāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.38c: māṃ prāpya hi guṇo doṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paśya lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.40a: naiva yakṣā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.40b: kiṃnarā vā manuṣyā vā sukhaṃ prāpsyanti lakṣmaṇa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.44a: na tāṃ kuśalinīṃ sītāṃ pradāsyanti mameśvarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.44b: asmin muhūrte saumitre mama drakṣyanti vikramam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.49a: naiva devā na daiteyā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.50b: nirmaryādān imāṃl lokān kariṣyāmy adya sāyakaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.50c: yathā jarā yathā mṛtyur yathā kālo yathā vidhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_60.51c: pureva me cārudatīm aninditāṃ diśanti sītāṃ yadi nādya maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.2a: vīkṣamāṇaṃ dhanuḥ sajyaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.2b: hantukāmaṃ paśuṃ rudraṃ kruddhaṃ dakṣakratau yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.3a: adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.4a: purā bhūtvā mṛdur dāntaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.4b: na krodhavaśam āpannaḥ prakṛtiṃ hātum arhasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.5a: candre lakṣmīḥ prabhā sūrye gatir vāyau bhuvi kṣamā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.5b: etac ca niyataṃ sarvaṃ tvayi cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.6a: na tu jānāmi kasyāyaṃ bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.6b: kena vā kasya vā hetoḥ sāyudhaḥ saparicchadaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.8a: ekasya tu vimardo 'yaṃ na dvayor vadatāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.8b: na hi vṛttaṃ hi paśyāmi balasya mahataḥ padam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.9a: naikasya tu kṛte lokān vināśayitum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.10a: sadā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śaraṇyaḥ paramā gatiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.10b: ko nu dārapraṇāśaṃ te sādhu manyeta rāghava // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.11b: nālaṃ te vipriyaṃ kartuṃ dīkṣitasyeva sādhavaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.12a: yena rājan hṛtā sītā tam anveṣitum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.13a: samudraṃ ca viceṣyāmaḥ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.13b: guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nalinīḥ pārvatīś ca ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.15a: na cet sāmnā pradāsyanti patnīṃ te tridaśeśvarāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_61.15c: śīlena sāmnā vinayena sītāṃ nayena na prāpsyasi cen narendra /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.2a: tataḥ saumitrir āśvāsya muhūrtād iva lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.3a: mahatā tapasā rāma mahatā cāpi karmaṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.4a: tava caiva guṇair baddhas tvadviyogān mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.4b: rājā devatvam āpanno bharatasya yathā śrutam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.5a: yadi duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ kākutstha na sahiṣyase /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.5b: prākṛtaś cālpasattvaś ca itaraḥ kaḥ sahiṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.6a: duḥkhito hi bhavāṃl lokāṃs tejasā yadi dhakṣyate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.6b: ārtāḥ prajā naravyāghra kva nu yāsyanti nirvṛtim // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.7b: gataḥ śakreṇa sālokyam anayas taṃ samaspṛśat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.8a: maharṣayo vasiṣṭhas tu yaḥ pitur naḥ purohitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.8b: ahnā putraśataṃ jajñe tathaivāsya punar hatam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.9a: yā ceyaṃ jagato mātā devī lokanamaskṛtā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.9b: asyāś ca calanaṃ bhūmer dṛśyate satyasaṃśrava // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.10a: yau cemau jagatāṃ netre yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.11a: sumahānty api bhūtāni devāś ca puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.12b: śrūyete naraśārdūla na tvaṃ vyathitum arhasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.13a: naṣṭāyām api vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api cānagha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.13b: śocituṃ nārhase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.14a: tvadvidhā hi na śocanti satataṃ satyadarśinaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.16b: nāntareṇa kriyāṃ teṣāṃ phalam iṣṭaṃ pravartate // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.17a: mām eva hi purā vīra tvam eva bahuśo 'nvaśāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.17b: anuśiṣyāddhi ko nu tvām api sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.18a: buddhiś ca te mahāprājña devair api duranvayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.19a: divyaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ caivam ātmanaś ca parākramam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_62.20b: tam eva tu ripuṃ pāpaṃ vijñāyoddhartum arhasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.2b: avaṣṭabhya dhanuś citraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.3a: kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vatsa kva vā gacchāva lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.4a: taṃ tathā paritāpārtaṃ lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.4b: idam eva janasthānaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.7a: tāni yukto mayā sārdhaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.8b: ity uktas tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicacāra salakṣmaṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.9a: kruddho rāmaḥ śaraṃ ghoraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.10a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgābhaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.10b: anena sītā vaidehī bhakṣitā nātra saṃśayaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.10c: gṛdhrarūpam idaṃ vyaktaṃ rakṣo bhramati kānanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.11b: enaṃ vadhiṣye dīptāgrair ghorair bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.12a: ity uktvābhyapatad gṛdhraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.12b: kruddho rāmaḥ samudrāntāṃ cālayann iva medinīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.13a: taṃ dīnadīnayā vācā saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ vaman /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.14b: sā devī mama ca prāṇā rāvaṇenobhayaṃ hṛtam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.15a: tvayā virahitā devī lakṣmaṇena ca rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.16a: sītām abhyavapanno 'haṃ rāvaṇaś ca raṇe mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.17a: etad asya dhanur bhagnam etad asya śarāvaram /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.17b: ayam asya raṇe rāma bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.17c: pariśrāntasya me pakṣau chittvā khaḍgena rāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.18b: rakṣasā nihataṃ pūrvaṃ na māṃ hantuṃ tvam arhasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.19a: rāmas tasya tu vijñāya sītāsaktāṃ priyāṃ kathām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.20b: samīkṣya duḥkhito rāmaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.21a: rājyād bhraṃśo vane vāsaḥ sītā naṣṭā hato dvijaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.22a: sampūrṇam api ced adya pratareyaṃ mahodadhim /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.22b: so 'pi nūnaṃ mamālakṣmyā viśuṣyet saritāṃ patiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.25a: ity evam uktvā bahuśo rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.26a: nikṛttapakṣaṃ rudhirāvasiktaṃ taṃ gṛdhrarājaṃ parirabhya rāmaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_63.26b: kva maithili prāṇasamā mameti vimucya vācaṃ nipapāta bhūmau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.1a: rāmaḥ prekṣya tu taṃ gṛdhraṃ bhuvi raudreṇa pātitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.2b: rākṣasena hataḥ saṃkhye prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.3a: ayam asya śarīre 'smin prāṇo lakṣmaṇa vidyate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.4a: jaṭāyo yadi śaknoṣi vākyaṃ vyāharituṃ punaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.4b: sītām ākhyāhi bhadraṃ te vadham ākhyāhi cātmanaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.5a: kiṃnimitto 'harat sītāṃ rāvaṇas tasya kiṃ mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.5b: aparāddhaṃ tu yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena hṛtā priyā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.6a: kathaṃ tac candrasaṃkāśaṃ mukham āsīn manoharam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.6b: sītayā kāni coktāni tasmin kāle dvijottama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.7a: kathaṃvīryaḥ kathaṃrūpaḥ kiṃkarmā sa ca rākṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.7b: kva cāsya bhavanaṃ tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.10a: pariśrāntasya me tāta pakṣau chittvā niśācaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.11a: uparudhyanti me prāṇā dṛṣṭir bhramati rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.12a: yena yāti muhūrtena sītām ādāya rāvaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.13a: vindo nāma muhūrto 'sau sa ca kākutstha nābudhat /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.13b: jhaṣavad baḍiśaṃ gṛhya kṣipram eva vinaśyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.14a: na ca tvayā vyathā kāryā janakasya sutāṃ prati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.14b: vaidehyā raṃsyase kṣipraṃ hatvā taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.16a: putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.16b: ity uktvā durlabhān prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.17b: tyaktvā śarīraṃ gṛdhrasya jagmuḥ prāṇā vihāyasam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.18a: sa nikṣipya śiro bhūmau prasārya caraṇau tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.18b: vikṣipya ca śarīraṃ svaṃ papāta dharaṇītale // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.19a: taṃ gṛdhraṃ prekṣya tāmrākṣaṃ gatāsum acalopamam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.19b: rāmaḥ subahubhir duḥkhair dīnaḥ saumitrim abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.20a: bahūni rakṣasāṃ vāse varṣāṇi vasatā sukham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.21b: so 'yam adya hataḥ śete kālo hi duratikramaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.22a: paśya lakṣmaṇa gṛdhro 'yam upakārī hataś ca me /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.22b: sītām abhyavapan no vai rāvaṇena balīyasā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.23b: mama hetor ayaṃ prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.25a: sītāharaṇajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na me saumya tathāgatam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.25b: yathā vināśo gṛdhrasya matkṛte ca paraṃtapa // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.26a: rājā daśarathaḥ śrīmān yathā mama mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.26b: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca tathāyaṃ patageśvaraḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.28b: imaṃ dhakṣyāmi saumitre hataṃ raudreṇa rakṣasā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.29a: yā gatir yajñaśīlānām āhitāgneś ca yā gatiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.29b: aparāvartināṃ yā ca yā ca bhūmipradāyinām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.30a: mayā tvaṃ samanujñāto gaccha lokān anuttamān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.30b: gṛdhrarāja mahāsattva saṃskṛtaś ca mayā vraja // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.31a: evam uktvā citāṃ dīptām āropya patageśvaram /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.31b: dadāha rāmo dharmātmā svabandhum iva duḥkhitaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.32a: rāmo 'tha sahasaumitrir vanaṃ yātvā sa vīryavān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.32b: sthūlān hatvā mahārohīn anu tastāra taṃ dvijam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.34a: yat tat pretasya martyasya kathayanti dvijātayaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.34b: tat svargagamanaṃ tasya kṣipraṃ rāmo jajāpa ha // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.35b: udakaṃ cakratus tasmai gṛdhrarājāya tāv ubhau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.35c: sa gṛdhrarājaḥ kṛtavān yaśaskaraṃ suduṣkaraṃ karma raṇe nipātitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_64.35d: maharṣikalpena ca saṃskṛtas tadā jagāma puṇyāṃ gatim ātmanaḥ śubhām //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.1a: kṛtvaivam udakaṃ tasmai prasthitau rāghavau tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.1b: avekṣantau vane sītāṃ paścimāṃ jagmatur diśam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.3a: gulmair vṛkṣaiś ca bahubhir latābhiś ca praveṣṭitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.4a: vyatikramya tu vegena gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.5a: tataḥ paraṃ janasthānāt trikrośaṃ gamya rāghavau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.7a: didṛkṣamāṇau vaidehīṃ tad vanaṃ tau vicikyatuḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.8a: lakṣmaṇas tu mahātejāḥ sattvavāñ śīlavāñ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.9a: spandate me dṛḍhaṃ bāhur udvignam iva me manaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.10a: tasmāt sajjībhavārya tvaṃ kuruṣva vacanaṃ hitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.10b: mamaiva hi nimittāni sadyaḥ śaṃsanti sambhramam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.11b: āvayor vijayaṃ yuddhe śaṃsann iva vinardati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.12a: tayor anveṣator evaṃ sarvaṃ tad vanam ojasā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.12b: saṃjajñe vipulaḥ śabdaḥ prabhañjann iva tad vanam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.13b: vanasya tasya śabdo 'bhūd divam āpūrayann iva // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.14a: taṃ śabdaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇas tu rāmaḥ kakṣe sahānujaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.15a: āsedatus tatas tatra tāv ubhau pramukhe sthitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.19a: ghorau bhujau vikurvāṇam ubhau yojanam āyatau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.19b: karābhyāṃ vividhān gṛhya ṛkṣān pakṣigaṇān mṛgān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.20b: sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ tayor bhrātroḥ prapannayoḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.22a: sa mahābāhur atyarthaṃ prasārya vipulau bhujau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.22b: jagrāha sahitāv eva rāghavau pīḍayan balāt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.25a: ghoraṃ deśam imaṃ prāptau mama bhakṣāv upasthitau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.25b: vadataṃ kāryam iha vāṃ kimarthaṃ cāgatau yuvām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.28b: vyasanaṃ jīvitāntāya prāptam aprāpya tāṃ priyām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.29a: tvāṃ ca māṃ ca naravyāghra vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.30a: śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.30c: iti bruvāṇo dṛḍhasatyavikramo mahāyaśā dāśarathiḥ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_65.30d: avekṣya saumitrim udagravikramaṃ sthirāṃ tadā svāṃ matim ātmanākarot //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.1a: tau tu tatra sthitau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.2a: tiṣṭhataḥ kiṃ nu māṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudhārtaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.3a: tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ prāptakālaṃ hitaṃ tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.4a: tvāṃ ca māṃ ca purā tūrṇam ādatte rākṣasādhamaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.4b: tasmād asibhyām asyāśu bāhū chindāvahai gurū // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.5a: tatas tau deśakālajñau khaḍgābhyām eva rāghavau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.6a: dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum asaktam asinā tataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.6b: cicheda rāmo vegena savyaṃ vīras tu lakṣmaṇaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.7b: khaṃ ca gāṃ ca diśaś caiva nādayañ jalado yathā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.8b: dīnaḥ papraccha tau vīrau kau yuvām iti dānavaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.10a: ayam ikṣvākudāyādo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.10b: asyaivāvarajaṃ viddhi bhrātaraṃ māṃ ca lakṣmaṇam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.12a: tvaṃ tu ko vā kimarthaṃ vā kabandha sadṛśo vane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.13a: evam uktaḥ kabandhas tu lakṣmaṇenottaraṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.14a: svāgataṃ vāṃ naravyāghrau diṣṭyā paśyāmi cāpy aham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.14b: diṣṭyā cemau nikṛttau me yuvābhyāṃ bāhubandhanau // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.15a: virūpaṃ yac ca me rūpaṃ prāptaṃ hy avinayād yathā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_66.15b: tan me śṛṇu naravyāghra tattvataḥ śaṃsatas tava // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.1a: rūpam āsīn mamācintyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.1b: yathā somasya śakrasya sūryasya ca yathā vapuḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.2a: so 'haṃ rūpam idaṃ kṛtvā lokavitrāsanaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.2b: ṛṣīn vanagatān rāma trāsayāmi tatas tataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.3a: tataḥ sthūlaśirā nāma maharṣiḥ kopito mayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.4b: etad eva nṛśaṃsaṃ te rūpam astu vigarhitam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.5a: sa mayā yācitaḥ kruddhaḥ śāpasyānto bhaved iti /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.6a: yadā chittvā bhujau rāmas tvāṃ dahed vijane vane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.6b: tadā tvaṃ prāpsyase rūpaṃ svam eva vipulaṃ śubham // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.7a: śriyā virājitaṃ putraṃ danos tvaṃ viddhi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.7b: indrakopād idaṃ rūpaṃ prāptam evaṃ raṇājire // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.8b: dīrgham āyuḥ sa me prādāt tato māṃ vibhramo 'spṛśat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.9a: dīrgham āyur mayā prāptaṃ kiṃ me śakraḥ kariṣyati /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.9b: ity evaṃ buddhim āsthāya raṇe śakram adharṣayam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.10b: sakthinī ca śiraś caiva śarīre saṃpraveśitam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.11a: sa mayā yācyamānaḥ sann ānayad yamasādanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.11b: pitāmahavacaḥ satyaṃ tad astv iti mamābravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.13a: evam uktas tu me śakro bāhū yojanam āyatau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.13b: prādād āsyaṃ ca me kukṣau tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭram akalpayat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.15a: sa tu mām abravīd indro yadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.15b: chetsyate samare bāhū tadā svargaṃ gamiṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.16a: sa tvaṃ rāmo 'si bhadraṃ te nāham anyena rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.16b: śakyo hantuṃ yathātattvam evam uktaṃ maharṣiṇā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.18a: evam uktas tu dharmātmā danunā tena rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.19a: rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā mama bhāryā yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.20a: nāmamātraṃ tu jānāmi na rūpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.20b: nivāsaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vā vayaṃ tasya na vidmahe // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.21b: kāruṇyaṃ sadṛśaṃ kartum upakāre ca vartatām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.22a: kāṣṭhāny ānīya śuṣkāṇi kāle bhagnāni kuñjaraiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.22b: bhakṣyāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ vīra śvabhre mahati kalpite // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.23a: sa tvaṃ sītāṃ samācakṣva yena vā yatra vā hṛtā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.23b: kuru kalyāṇam atyarthaṃ yadi jānāsi tattvataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.24a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vākyaṃ danur anuttamam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.24b: provāca kuśalo vaktuṃ vaktāram api rāghavam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.25a: divyam asti na me jñānaṃ nābhijānāmi maithilīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.25b: yas tāṃ jñāsyati taṃ vakṣye dagdhaḥ svaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.26a: adagdhasya hi vijñātuṃ śaktir asti na me prabho /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.26b: rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahāvīryaṃ sītā yena hṛtā tava // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.27a: vijñānaṃ hi mahad bhraṣṭaṃ śāpadoṣeṇa rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.28a: kiṃ tu yāvan na yāty astaṃ savitā śrāntavāhanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.28b: tāvan mām avaṭe kṣiptvā daha rāma yathāvidhi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.29b: vakṣyāmi tam ahaṃ vīra yas taṃ jñāsyati rākṣasam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.30a: tena sakhyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ nyāyyavṛttena rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.31a: na hi tasyāsty avijñātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_67.31b: sarvān parisṛto lokān purā vai kāraṇāntare // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.1a: evam uktau tu tau vīrau kabandhena nareśvarau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.4a: sa vidhūya citām āśu vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.4b: araje vāsasī bibhran mālāṃ divyāṃ mahābalaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.6b: prabhayā ca mahātejā diśo daśa virājayan // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.7b: śṛṇu rāghava tattvena yathā sīmām avāpsyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.8a: rāma ṣaḍ yuktayo loke yābhiḥ sarvaṃ vimṛśyate /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.9b: yat kṛte vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ tvayā dārapradharṣaṇam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.10a: tad avaśyaṃ tvayā kāryaḥ sa suhṛt suhṛdāṃ vara /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.10b: akṛtvā na hi te siddhim ahaṃ paśyāmi cintayan // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.11a: śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.12b: nivasaty ātmavān vīraś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.13a: vayasyaṃ taṃ kuru kṣipram ito gatvādya rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.14a: na ca te so 'vamantavyaḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.14b: kṛtajñaḥ kāmarūpī ca sahāyārthī ca vīryavān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.15a: śaktau hy adya yuvāṃ kartuṃ kāryaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.15b: kṛtārtho vākṛtārtho vā kṛtyaṃ tava kariṣyati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.16a: sa ṛkṣarajasaḥ putraḥ pampām aṭati śaṅkitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.18a: sa hi sthānāni sarvāṇi kārtsnyena kapikuñjaraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.19a: na tasyāviditaṃ loke kiṃcid asti hi rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.20a: sa nadīr vipulāñ śailān giridurgāṇi kandarān /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.21b: diśo vicetuṃ tāṃ sītāṃ tvadviyogena śocatīm // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.21c: sa meruśṛṅgāgragatām aninditāṃ praviśya pātālatale 'pi vāśritām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_68.21d: plavaṃgamānāṃ pravaras tava priyāṃ nihatya rakṣāṃsi punaḥ pradāsyati //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.1b: vākyam anvartham arthajñaḥ kabandhaḥ punar abravīt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.2a: eṣa rāma śivaḥ panthā yatraite puṣpitā drumāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.3b: aśvatthāḥ karṇikārāś ca cūtāś cānye ca pādapāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.4a: tān āruhyāthavā bhūmau pātayitvā ca tān balāt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.5a: caṅkramantau varān deśāñ śailāc chailaṃ vanād vanam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.5b: tataḥ puṣkariṇīṃ vīrau pampāṃ nāma gamiṣyathaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.7a: tatra haṃsāḥ plavāḥ krauñcāḥ kurarāś caiva rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.9a: rohitān vakratuṇḍāṃś ca nalamīnāṃś ca rāghava /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.9b: pampāyām iṣubhir matsyāṃs tatra rāma varān hatān // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.11a: bhṛśaṃ te khādato matsyān pampāyāḥ puṣpasaṃcaye /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.13a: apāṃ lobhād upāvṛttān vṛṣabhān iva nardataḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.13b: rūpānvitāṃś ca pampāyāṃ drakṣyasi tvaṃ narottama // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.14b: śītodakaṃ ca pampāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokaṃ vihāsyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.15b: utpalāni ca phullāni paṅkajāni ca rāghava // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.16a: na tāni kaścin mālyāni tatrāropayitā naraḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.17b: ye prapetur mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ śarīrāt svedabindavaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.18a: tāni mālyāni jātāni munīnāṃ tapasā tadā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.20a: tvāṃ tu dharme sthitā nityaṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.21a: tatas tad rāma pampāyās tīram āśritya paścimam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.22a: na tatrākramituṃ nāgāḥ śaknuvanti tam āśramam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.22b: ṛṣes tasya mataṃgasya vidhānāt tac ca kānanam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.25a: śayānaḥ puruṣo rāma tasya śailasya mūrdhani /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.25b: yat svapne labhate vittaṃ tat prabuddho 'dhigacchati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.26b: tatraiva praharanty enaṃ suptam ādāya rākṣasāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.29a: te tatra pītvā pānīyaṃ vimalaṃ śītam avyayam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.30a: rāma tasya tu śailasya mahatī śobhate guhā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.31a: tasyā guhāyāḥ prāgdvāre mahāñ śītodako hradaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.32a: tasyāṃ vasati sugrīvaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.33a: kabandhas tv anuśāsyaivaṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.34a: taṃ tu khasthaṃ mahābhāgaṃ kabandhaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.34b: prasthitau tvaṃ vrajasveti vākyam ūcatur antikāt // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.35a: gamyatāṃ kāryasiddhyartham iti tāv abravīc ca saḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.35b: suprītau tāv anujñāpya kabandhaḥ prasthitas tadā // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.35c: sa tat kabandhaḥ pratipadya rūpaṃ vṛtaḥ śriyā bhāskaratulyadehaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_69.35d: nidarśayan rāmam avekṣya khasthaḥ sakhyaṃ kuruṣveti tadābhyuvāca //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.1a: tau kabandhena taṃ mārgaṃ pampāyā darśitaṃ vane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.3a: kṛtvā ca śailapṛṣṭhe tu tau vāsaṃ raghunandanau /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.4a: tau puṣkariṇyāḥ pampāyās tīram āsādya paścimam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.4b: apaśyatāṃ tatas tatra śabaryā ramyam āśramam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.5a: tau tam āśramam āsādya drumair bahubhir āvṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.6a: tau tu dṛṣṭvā tadā siddhā samutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.6b: pādau jagrāha rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.7a: tām uvāca tato rāmaḥ śramaṇīṃ saṃśitavratām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.7b: kaccit te nirjitā vighnāḥ kaccit te vardhate tapaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.7c: kaccit te niyataḥ kopa āhāraś ca tapodhane /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.8a: kaccit te niyamāḥ prāptāḥ kaccit te manasaḥ sukham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.9a: rāmeṇa tāpasī pṛṣṭā sā siddhā siddhasaṃmatā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.10b: itas te divam ārūḍhā yān ahaṃ paryacāriṣam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.11a: taiś cāham uktā dharmajñair mahābhāgair maharṣibhiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.11b: āgamiṣyati te rāmaḥ supuṇyam imam āśramam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.12b: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā varāṃl lokān akṣayāṃs tvaṃ gamiṣyasi // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.13a: mayā tu vividhaṃ vanyaṃ saṃcitaṃ puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.14a: evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā śabaryā śabarīm idam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.14b: rāghavaḥ prāha vijāne tāṃ nityam abahiṣkṛtām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.15a: danoḥ sakāśāt tattvena prabhāvaṃ te mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.15b: śrutaṃ pratyakṣam icchāmi saṃdraṣṭuṃ yadi manyase // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.16a: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmavaktrād viniḥsṛtam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.16b: śabarī darśayāmāsa tāv ubhau tad vanaṃ mahat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.18a: iha te bhāvitātmāno guravo me mahādyute /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.19a: iyaṃ pratyaksthalī vedī yatra te me susatkṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.22a: kṛtābhiṣekais tair nyastā valkalāḥ pādapeṣv iha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.23a: kṛtsnaṃ vanam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca śrutaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.23b: tad icchāmy abhyanujñātā tyaktum etat kalevaram // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.24a: teṣām icchāmy ahaṃ gantuṃ samīpaṃ bhāvitātmanām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.24b: munīnām āśramo yeṣām ahaṃ ca paricāriṇī // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_70.25a: dharmiṣṭhaṃ tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.1a: divaṃ tu tasyāṃ yātāyāṃ śabaryāṃ svena karmaṇā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.2a: cintayitvā tu dharmātmā prabhāvaṃ taṃ mahātmanām /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.4a: saptānāṃ ca samudrāṇām eṣu tīrtheṣu lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.4b: upaspṛṣṭaṃ ca vidhivat pitaraś cāpi tarpitāḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.5a: pranaṣṭam aśubhaṃ yat tat kalyāṇaṃ samupasthitam /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.5b: tena tv etat prahṛṣṭaṃ me mano lakṣmaṇa samprati // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.6b: tad āgaccha gamiṣyāvaḥ pampāṃ tāṃ priyadarśanām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.7b: nityaṃ vālibhayāt trastaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.8a: abhitvare ca taṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.8b: tadadhīnaṃ hi me saumya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.9a: iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ saumitrir idam abravīt /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.9b: gacchāvas tvaritaṃ tatra mamāpi tvarate manaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.10a: āśramāt tu tatas tasmān niṣkramya sa viśāṃ patiḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.11b: etaiś cānyaiś ca vividhair nāditaṃ tad vanaṃ mahat // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.12a: sa rāmo vividhān vṛkṣān sarāṃsi vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.13a: sa tām āsādya vai rāmo dūrād udakavāhinīm /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.14b: viveśa nalinīṃ pampāṃ paṅkajaiś ca samāvṛtām // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.20a: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ pampāṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.21a: tilakair bījapūraiś ca vaṭaiḥ śukladrumais tathā /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.21b: puṣpitaiḥ karavīraiś ca puṃnāgaiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.23a: asyās tīre tu pūrvoktaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ /
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.24b: adhyāste taṃ mahāvīryaḥ sugrīva iti viśrutaḥ // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.25b: ity uvāca punar vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavikramam // //
GE09ram_03pu:ram_71.26a: tato mahad vartma ca dūrasaṃkramaṃ krameṇa gatvā pravilokayan vanam /
